description: Cashflow application helps to track your daily expenses and income. It's fast and simple, designed to enable you record actual spendings and income immediately as they happen, not later on (when some details can be easily forgotten). It's not designed to be your balance sheet but rather easy and simple tracker instrument of your expenses and income events, with good retrospective view. Below are just some of the early features of the application (more to come!): - Fast and easy data entry, be it expense or income. You just need to enter name, your spending or earning and enter/pick relevant category. - No mess with manual selection of expense/income categories: the system will show you available suggestions as you type, even when you type in just one matching character. - Tunable entry list: you can configure the timeframe it covers (please check settings). - You can choose among different statistics periods to review your statistics of expenses and income. - You can display statistics as charts or per categories. - You can of course edit categories as a separate, auto populated list. Much more features are coming soon (backup of data, integration with SMS notifications etc) - please stay tuned! Please check application's Help one-pager to easily understand all the bundled features.
release_text: Added backup/restore feature (experimental). Added feedback and rank features (please share your feedback!)

description: Easily calculate your caloric and macro-nutrient requirements and track your daily food intake, to help you reach your goals whatever they may be. -- NEW -- - Great new user interface and a completely new rebuild from scratch -- FOOD -- - Your food database is completely offline, meaning virtually NO loading times when searching for foods - Search our constantly growing online database of thousands of foods! Any food you select will be saved to your device so next time you won't need to search online - Swipe left/right to switch between looking at the foods you've eaten on each day, and your daily nutritional summary of each day, comparing it directly to your calculated requirements, depending on the type of day you choose, for example: a workout day at maintenance, a non-workout day for weight gain, a general day for weight loss - Quick and easy food entry: select from your favourite, recently added, most frequently added and custom foods - View how many calories, grams of protein, carbohydrates and fats per food item directly from the main diary - View the nutritional breakdown of entire meals in an easy to read pie chart and quickly create new meals or recipes - Quickly add calories and macronutrient values to your food diary when you can't find the food you've eaten. You can edit/delete these entries later, give them names, and save them as custom foods - Use the barcode scanner to quickly search for foods -- TARGETS -- - Simple and effective calculations with customisable settings which gives not just one result, but results for combinations of general, workout days and non-workout days with maintenance, weight loss and weight gain - Select from a choice of different formulae: Simple, Cunningham and Harris Benedict - Choose whether you want to use the automatic calculations, or enter your own values for any type of day or diet type, e.g. low-carb, low-fat, refeed, fat loss -- CUSTOM FOODS -- - Create custom foods, meals and recipes, and add them easily into your diary - Create groups for your custom foods, meals and recipes - Create an account to upload your custom foods and download other users custom foods - Rate other users custom foods for accuracy -- PROGRESS -- - Track your body weight daily and take progress pictures for each day - Compare your daily caloric or macronutrient intake to your body weight on the same graph - Your daily caloric or macronutrient graph also shows your calculated requirement for each day depending on what you selected in the 'FOOD' section, so you know how well you're following the calculations - See how much weight you've lost/gained over a period of time -- DATA -- - Easily export your food diary and body weight data to CSV format, for use with spreadsheet software such as Microsoft Excel! (The PRO version lets you select the dates that you want to export your food diary and body weight data from, and whether you want to export each food from your food diary when exporting your food diary data) - Create a backup of ALL of your data which you can restore later on -- UPGRADE TO THE PRO VERSION FOR -- - No ads - Select the dates that you want to export your food diary and body weight data from, and whether you want to export each food from your food diary when exporting your food diary data -- WIDGET -- - See your caloric and macronutrient info right on your home screen with the Cals & Macros widget!

OverSkreen is the best floating browser on Android! With OverSkreen, you can do multiple tasks at the same time! You don't have to switch from one application to another anymore. OverSkreen Browser can live on top of your screen! You can check a video on the right side of your screen and write a message at the same time! ★★★ SATISFIED OR REFUNDED ★★★ View and interact with multiple screens at once. OverSkreen enables true multi-tasking. ● Features : ★ Floating browser: you can move, resize or minimize your browser ★ Adobe Flash support (*) ★ Tabbed browsing ★ Private browsing (*) ★ Access to your bookmarks/history ★ Built-in Desktop/iPhone/iPad/Honeycomb/Froyo user-agent ★ Suggest-while-typing URL bar ★ Quick Hide (double tap the title bar) ★ Chrome keyboard shortcuts ★ Bookmarks folder support (*) ★ Synchronisation of your Chrome Bookmarks (**) * Android 3.0 and above ** Android 4.0 and above ● Known limitations - On Android version 2.2.x / 2.3.x only, Adobe Flash plugin doesn't support floating applications and may crash. This is an Adobe bug. Some customers reported it as working though. Please upgrade your device to Android 3.0/4.0 or above. Please note that mobile version of YouTube doesn't requires Flash at all. ★ ★ ★ If you have any question on the app, send us an email: support@myboyfriendisageek.com . We respond personally to every single email we receive ★ ★ ★ ● FAQ ★ Can I watch YouTube ? Sure. You can do whatever you do with your stock browser.

ASUS Launcher is a sublime user interface that makes every aspect of your mobile device easier and more enjoyable to use. It’s an intuitive launcher that lets you personalize your home screen experience with theme and wallpaper options, widgets, scroll effects, font customization, plus other important home screen settings. Aside from a personalized home screen experience, ASUS Launcher also helps you easily interact with other ASUS ZenUI apps such as What’s Next, Do It Later, Email, Calendar, PixelMaster Camera, Gallery, Share Link, PC Link, Remote Link, Sound Recorder, Calculator, and Music. Check out the latest special features we’ve got in store for you: Special features • Advanced AppLock (powered by CMCM) provides snooper-catching and pattern lock app protection features. • Swipe up on your home screen to open ASUS Launcher. • All app background transparency allows you to harmonize the appearance of your apps together with your chosen wallpaper. • Apps gives you quick access into the All-Apps screen. • Widgets gives you quick access to all widget options. • Icon packs allow you to change appearance of your app icons. • Scroll effects lets you choose a specific animation to use when browsing through home pages. • Edit pages leads you to Page Management where you can edit and set your main home screen page. • Wallpapers feature lets you set your preferred wallpaper on the home screen, lock screen, or both. • Preferences allow you to customize the settings of ASUS Launcher such as Font, Applications, Scroll animation, Unread counts, Wallpaper, and Icon/Folder. • Settings feature gives you quick access to your device’s Settings menu. • More options gives you to quick access to ZenUI Help and Play Store. Tips and Tricks • While on the home screen, zoom out on your device to launch Page Management. •While on the home screen, you may also tap-and-hold on an empty space to open ASUS Launcher. •To add apps and widgets to your home screen, tap-and-hold on the app or widget then drag-and-drop it to your preferred location. •To uninstall or disable multiple apps quickly, use the Uninstall/Disable menu option in the All Apps screen. •To find hidden apps, go to the Hide apps screen then tap on the small eye icon on the lower middle part of your screen. This icon is beside the dotted page indicators. Notes •The appearance and operation of some features may vary, depending on your device. •ASUS Launcher is a free app for ASUS devices. You will not be charged for downloading or using this app. •To set ASUS ZenUI Launcher as the default launcher, once installed just tap your device’s Home button and choose "Always" •The results of your customized font settings appear only on ASUS Launcher screens. •If you are already using App Lock in ASUS Launcher, you can just switch it to enjoy these new features: 1. Swipe up/long press to activate home management to home preferences. 2. Tap 'AppLock mode' to switch to 'Advanced (powered by CMCM)' •If you already use CM AppLock from Clean Master or CM Security , you wouldn’t see the AppLock mode to switch. After cleaning data from Clean Master or CM Security, you can enjoy Advanced AppLock (powered by CMCM) right at ASUS Launcher. • Advance AppLock would recommend goodies on the App lock screen to provide the content you may be interested with, without increasing too much data usage. If you don't want to see it again, you can turn it off on the settings of Advanced AppLock. More information For more product information and videos, check out http://www.asus.com/ZenUI/ Feedbacks and suggestions We’d love to hear from you! Send us your feedbacks via: zenui@asus.com
release_text: ↑ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ↑ Like this app? Keep us inspired by giving a 5-star rating! [New Features] - App folders open in full screen mode, spreading out your apps onscreen. You can also revert back to the original style. - Advanced AppLock (powered by CMCM) provides snooper-catching and pattern lock app protection features. - Lock Home Screen enables locking your home screen to prevent random home screen changes and accidental drag-and-drops. - Miscellaneous bug fixes.

description: It’s lunch time! People are excited to visit your new burger shop and try the delicious hamburgers everyone has been talking about! Check the ingredients and get ready to serve the customers a delightful meal of their favorite sandwich recipes! In My Burger Shop you’ll run the hottest fast food restaurant in town. Manage to serve your clients with your restaurant’s tasty specialties: delicious hamburgers and cheeseburgers -- with extra cheese, onions, pickles, tomatoes and, of course, a lot of bacon! And what about some French fries? Complete the order with a refreshing drink, juice or soda! Serve your customers with an efficient service to earn coins that you can use to buy new ingredients and other items to customize your shop. Paint the walls, change the floor, buy new trays, lights and much more. You can also unlock new ingredients to make even more burgers and let your business grow. My Burger Shop is the most fun time management, fast food restaurant and hamburger making game, download now and check it for yourself! HIGHLIGHTS • Many ingredients to choose from, just like in a real burger shop: bread, cheese, crispy burgers, chicken patties, lettuce, onions, pickles, even sausages and much more. • Customizable items to give the store the look you want • Two different types of beverages: juice and soda • Serve weird and funny customers • Addictive time management gameplay • Lots of bacon -- everyone loves bacon, right? Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

영어신문, 이제 어렵지 않게 세련된 영어를 공부해보세요! 클릭한번으로, 또는 모아뒀다 한번에 검색으로 좀 더 효율적인 단어 습득과 해석에 도움이 됩니다. 조금 더 성숙한 언어 습득으로 초딩영어를 탈출할 수 있습니다. 1. 단어검색 영자신문을 보며 모르는 단어가 있으면 클릭 한번으로 바로 검색할 수 있습니다. 기존의 영자신문 앱은 드래그를 해야 하는 단점이 있었습니다. 이제 어려운 드래그 대신 클릭하세요! * 추후 업데이트될 예정인 영어단어장을 이용해 오늘 공부한 영어단어를 체크할 수 있습니다. 2. 숙어검색 여러 단어를 한꺼번에 검색해 보세요 ! 복수검색 기능을 제공하므로 숙어 검색 뿐 아니라 모르는 단어를 한꺼번에 담아 검색할 수 있습니다. * 영영 사전이 연동된 "영문 버전"의 새로운 앱이 곧 출시 예정입니다. 영영사전으로 더욱 자연스러운 영어를 학습해 보세요! 연동될 영영 사전 사이트는 현지인들이 어학연수 중인 학생들에게 추천하는 사이트로 좀 더 직관적인 영어공부에 도움이 됩니다. 곧 출시될 영문판도 많은 이용 부탁 드립니다. * 영어신문은 실제 사용되는 고급어휘들과 세련된 표현들로 이루어져 있지만 어려운 단어가 나오는 경우가 많습니다. 추후 업데이트 예정될 영자신문뽀개기 팁과 단어장을 활용해 보세요! [ 추후 업데이트 예정 ] - 현재 서비스되는 코리아헤럴드, 뉴욕타임즈, 네셔널 포스트 외에 "로이터 통신" 이 추가될 예정입니다. - 영어 단어장 추가 예정 영어단어 검색 후 바로 영어단어장에 저장, 관리 할 수 있습니다. (기한 미정) * 위 앱은 스마트 폰에 최적화 되어 있어 타블렛 PC에선 다소 UI가 깨질 수 있습니다. 양해 부탁 드립니다.
release_text: 원활한 어플 이용을 위해서 항상 최신버전으로 업데이트 해주세요 ! 1. 로이터 통신 추가(14.03.02) 2. 뉴욕타임즈 버그 수정 및 서버 복구(14.02.03) 3. 메인 디자인 업데이트(13.11.23) 4. 코리아헤럴드 서비스 중단 신문사 측의 요청으로 인해 서비스를 중단하게 되었습니다. 5. 서버 이전(13.08) 어플 업데이트를 하지 않으시면 9월 부터는 단어검색 서비스를 이용할 수 없습니다. 현재 제공되는 신문사 외에도 이용하시고 싶으신 신문사가 있으시면 말씀해 주세요. 추가 요청 주신 신문사에 대해서는 별도로 서비스 추가가 가능한 신문사에 대해 선별 작업을 하고 있습니다. 앞으로도 많은 관심 부탁드립니다. 소중한 관심 감사드립니다 :D

app_name: SRPG 新天魔界 ジェネレーション オブ カオス IV
description: 「新天魔界 ジェネレーション オブ カオス IV」は、あらゆる種族が大陸の覇権を争うファンタジー世界を舞台に、150名余りのキャラクターが登場するシミュレーションRPGです。 ストーリ性はもちろん、ストラテジーの要素にも重点が置かれており、リアルタイム集団バトルも快適に楽しめます。 時間帯に応じマップ上に差す太陽の光が自動的に変わる機能もあり、リアルタイムでファンタジーの世界を味わえます。 ・3Dバトルシーン ・容量：1.2GB ・ジャンル：シミュレーションRPG ・登場キャラクター数：150名 ・プレイ時間：約100時間 ・キャラクターボイス搭載 ・90以上の必殺技ムービー ・10本のシナリオ ・30vs30集団バトル ・取扱説明書付 ・二種類のタッチモード（スマートフォン用・タブレット用） NVIDIA SHIELDおよびXbox360のコントローラーをご使用の場合： 左アナログスティックをクリック　→　SELECTボタン 右アナログスティックをクリック　→　STARTボタン ©2011-2015 IDEA FACTORY, developed for Android, licensed and published by HYPERDEVBOX . "Shintencho Makai Generation of Chaos IV" is to stage a fantasy world in which every race is vying for supremacy of the continent, is a simulation RPG the character of more than 150 people appeared. Story, of course, and emphasis is placed also on the elements of the strategy, you can enjoy real-time population Battle also comfortable. There is also a function of the light of the sun to plug it on the map depending on the time zone is changed automatically, I can enjoy the world of fantasy in real time.   · 3D battle scene And capacity: 1.2GB Genre: Simulation RPG - Characters number: 150 Play time: about 100 hours Character voice equipped · More than 90 deathblow movie · 10 pieces of scenario · 30vs30 population Battle · Instruction papers - Two types of touch mode (for smartphone-tablet) If you are using a controller of NVIDIA SHIELD and Xbox360: Click on the left analog stick → SELECT button Click on the right analog stick → START button © 2011-2015 IDEA FACTORY, developed for Android, licensed and published by HYPERDEVBOX.
release_text: .Upgraded to Google's OBB system for game data download. .NOTE: game will take up less space after install (around 400MB less) however for users that are upgrading it may take up to twice the space during the upgrading process. this space will be freed after the upgrading process is completed. .Increased controller support. .Add Nvidia Shield support.

description: After decades of research scientists at Binary Laboratory have finally managed to compress the logic of a Rubik's cube into TWO dimensions. To win simply arrange the grid of squares so that all its columns or all its rows are the same color. Shift the rows and columns, but don't be wasteful because you get a limited number of moves. Features * 500 levels of riveting polygonal combat * Random mode for INFINITE levels and an ETERNITY of fun * Timed mode for twitchy speed junkies * Minimalist visuals that rivals the artistic genius of Barnett Newman * No advertisements, commercials or product placements * No pop-ups to tell you to rate this app, though if you want to rate this app five stars please do so now * IQ designation for levels to indicate how smart or stupid you are (Note: Levels do not actually correlate to IQ)
release_text: * Removed locks on levels. As a result the game is now 8% less frustrating.

description: A wonderful game for toddlers and kids with a cute collection of delicious fruits and tasty vegetables! your kid loves memory games , puzzles and want to learn to know the fruit ? This is the app for you! Your child will discover all kinds of fruits and in the meanwhile will exercise his memory! Fruits and Vegetables for Toddlers and Kids is an educational and entertaining game. It is a nice, simple, fun, and colorful game for toddlers and kids! Play with delicious vegetables ! A lot of different tablecloths and many funny fruits to keep your kid busy. Easy to learn and to control: -touch the screen and try to match the fruit hidden under the dish, find the couple! -interact with all the elements on the screen when a game is solved -when a game is completed tap the arrow to change to the next level You can also choose the difficulty level: easy, medium and hard, to suit the needs of each child and exercise your toddler memory. Available for all screen resolutions and devices, including tablet device as Kindle and Samsung ! Simple and intuitive, your baby will have lots of fun for hours ! This educational game will help your toddler to improve skills in problem solving, logical and cognitive skills, concentration and memory. Find out the vegetables and all the fruits hiding under the dishes! Features: - high quality game for toddlers and preschool kids from ages 0 to 7 with a lot of vegetables and colorful fruit ! - Easy to use and control - fun for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children and pre-teens, designed for preschool boys and girls - Simple for toddlers and babies with different levels of difficulty - Toddlers develop their fine motor skills and improve their memory - Play with your child or let them play alone - use it to keep your baby or toddler occupied - more than 100 vegetables and fruits in the FULL version: apple, lemon, tomato, eggplant, chili, corn, garlic, pear, pineapple and many others - randomly generated memory games! this educational game will never get old! This is the FREE version (Ads supported), If your kid likes this app, then you can buy the FULL version with more memory games, more vegetables , fruits and no ads https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.romesoft.toddlers.memory.fruitsFull Fun and enjoyable to learn and to play, this is a must have app! A lot of educational memory games for toddlers and young kids!! Your child will admire every kind of vegetable and will hear funny sound effects! Ideal for children but also fun for adults who want to play with their kids! This app is a memory trainer for all the family ! A fun brain training app for kids! Are you ready to challenge your memory ? Match up the fruit pairs! Fruits and Vegetables for Toddlers and Kids is a funny memory game which also helps your kid training his memory ability. A lot of game for children, the best games for kids, apps for babies, games for girls, match game, puzzle, educational games, all from romeLab !

description: A free, very entertaining app in which a friendly, cute looking cat talks back and says whatever you say to her, in a funny pet like voice. Kids love the cat's look, her voice, and they feel as if they are talking to a real cat. Adults also get lots of entertainment and laughs.

★ Animated LightHouse Live Wallpaper LightHouse Live Wallpaper consists of Lighthouse and Street Light which sheds lights. It changes according to the time of a day, and sometimes it is rainy or snowy. You can set your wallpaper with a vivid lighhouse or a vivid street light which sheds lights. Thanks for reading. ★ How to install Live Wallpaper? Important !! At first, download LightHouse Live Wallpaper. and if you press any point of wallpaper of your mobile over 2 seconds. then you can see the menu with a title {Add to Home screen} composed of sub menu 1) Shortcuts, 2) Widgets, 3) Folders, 4) Wallpapers. Press 'Wallpapers' and then press 'Live Wallpaper' Now you can install downloaded live wallpaper. ★ Specification 1. Two landscapes, LightHouse and Street Lamp. 2. Lighthous lighting animations. 3. Rain or snow animation. 4. See whole image : Touch leftward or rightward. ★ System Requirement 1. OS : Over Android 2.1 2. Required Disk Space : 10 Mbytes 3. Supported Language : English, Korean, Chinese, Japanese

Nike Football is a free app that helps you play more football. Join a game near you, start a game with friends, and get the latest Nike product before anyone else. Easily see and join games that are happening near you. Start a game of pick-up with your friends by setting a time and location, and let the app keep track of who’s in. Get early access to buy the latest product.
release_text: -See a map of games happening near you. -Join pick-up games with a click of a button. -Setup an open game in your area for other footballers to join. -Share game details with your friends. -Get invites from Nike to play games in your city.

description: Become a star and impress your friends! Select your photo and place it on the billboards of the most emblematic places. Just choose your favorite picture and the desired frame to create in seconds a original souvenir. With "Billboard Photo Frames", you can: ★ Select a photo gallery or capture it with your camera phone. ★ Wide range of styles and different frames for any picture. ★ Multiple frames high definition ads. ★ Tap and apply different effects to your composition: Black and White, sepia, grayscale, rotate, zoom and more!. ★ Share your creations via WhatsApp, Line, Facebook, Twitter, email and other social networks. ★ Easy to use: your photo composition in 2 steps! ★ No internet connection is required.

description: ***SPECIAL 50% off sale for a limited time so download today (normal price $4.99)*** NOW OPTIMISED FOR 7"-10" TABLETS INCLUDING NEXUS 10! NOT SUITABLE FOR PHONES. What Platinum Tasks users say: Lifehacker: "Beautiful...a polished, intuitive task management app." 5* - Best tablet task app yet. Fantastically polished and easy to use, fully syncs with Google (but only if you want to). Best task management app I've found to date. 5* - The best - by far - so far. This app is the best task management app on the market. 5* - It's very polished and beautiful app and functions very well. 5* - Been searching for a great todo/task app and I have found it! Platinum Tasks is it! 5* - I have been looking for a professional task manager that would help me with my business. I've found it. 5* - It is probably the nicest looking app on Honeycomb that syncs with Google Tasks. 5* - I just got my tablet and wanted a task app that would sync with gtasks. I tried another one and it didn't support labels very easily unlike Platinum that works great. The dashboard is customizable. It's very polished and beautiful app and functions very well. Platinum Tasks is an advanced task manager (to do list) to help you easily manage your day to day activities through a beautifully-designed, intuitive interface optimised for Android tablets (3.0+), ensuring that you will never miss another business meeting, birthday, anniversary, or even forget the milk! Syncs with your Google Tasks in Gmail account or Google Apps account so your to do list is always up-to-date. With Platinum Tasks you can: • Easily create one off or recurring tasks, from daily chores to yearly reminders of birthdays & anniversaries. • Label your tasks according to preset categories such as Work, Meetings and Personal or create your own labels. • Create complex projects containing multiple tasks, with set time limits & deadlines. • Filter items by time, name & label, or search to quickly find a specific task. • Archive and un-archive completed tasks using the drag & drop interface. • Customise the look of your interface by choosing from five different colour themes. • Synchronise your Google Tasks task list automatically so you're always up-to-date, whether on your computer or your Android Tablet. • View your tasks without even launching the app using the widget included. The great drag-and-drop functionality you're used to with the Gmail application has been implemented in Platinum Tasks so you can easily drag & drop any task from one label into another & archive (or unarchive) tasks. Tasks can also be synchronised with Google Tasks (just link your account on the settings page) so everything is backed up in the cloud & you have peace of mind that you're not going to lose things. We're currently working on: - Complete tasks directly from the widget - Export task lists - New help screen - Sync with Google Calendar We are a small, indie developer & although we don't have access to ALL Android tablets, if you find Platinum Tasks doesn't work perfectly on your device, tell us about it at http://help.platinumapps.com.au & we'll do everything we can to resolve any issues you may experience as quickly as possible. Love it? Please leave a review. Hate it or having issues? Please visit http://help.platinumapps.com.au so we can assist you. IMPORTANT: Ensure you have an active internet connection when first launching Platinum Tasks for initial licensing/sync. ISSUES? APP NOT DOWNLOADING/INSTALLING OR DISPLAYS A LICENSING ERROR? NEED TECHNICAL SUPPORT OR HAVE SUGGESTIONS ON HOW TO MAKE THE APP BETTER? Please visit http://help.platinumapps.com.au/ . WE READ AND RESPOND TO ALL SUPPORT REQUESTS. Looking for Google Tasks, Gtasks, Any.do, Wunderlist or a great task manager or to do list to help manage your tasks for today, tomorrow or one day, well Platinum Tasks will help with getting things done on your Android Honeycomb or ICS 4.0+ tablet.
release_text: V1.51 - Minor layout tweak for Nexus 10 Dashboard view. V1.5 - Optimised for Nexus 10 and other devices with high resolution screens. - Performance improvements and bug fixes. We test all releases thoroughly prior to release, however if you experience any issues or have any feedback/suggestions, please e-mail us on support@platinumapps.com.au or visit http://help.platinumapps.com.au

description: Ever wonder what the capital of Tennessee is or what the flag of New York looks like? Find out this information and more with the US States app! US States contains very basic information for each of the 50 states of America, such as the capital city, time zones, and population. It also shows the location of the state capital. This is a free app with no advertisements! **************** This is a demo app that accompanies the source code that can be found here: https://github.com/marwfair/USStates . Its purpose is to demonstrate how to load bitmaps efficiently in Android, especially very large ones. ****************

English Offline moden kepada kamus Melayu dengan periksa ejaan! Kamus ini membantu anda untuk mencari dengan cepat untuk Bahasa Inggeris ke Bahasa Melayu. Bilangan perkataan disediakan untuk carian dalam kamus online ini, telah mencapai 40,000 dan masih berkembang. Di samping menyediakan anda padanan perkataan Melayu untuk carian anda, kamus Melayu juga memberikan anda perkataan Melayu yang berkaitan dengan sebutan mereka. Jika anda sedang belajar Bahasa Inggeris dan anda ingin tahu makna di Malaysia, maka program ini adalah untuk anda. A Bahasa Inggeris lengkap offline kepada jurulatih Malaysia. Anda boleh mencari apa-apa perkataan dan kemudian klik pada untuk membaca / belajar makna dalam bahasa Melayu. Ciri-ciri aplikasi ini ialah: > Layout adalah sangat mudah dan berguna > Teks kepada ciri ucapan menambah, mendengar sebutan perkataan > Bolehkah bookmark perkataan yang diingini, kemudian boleh memadam / menyembunyikan atau menunjukkan kepada mereka > Boleh lihat sejarah carian anda > Warna teks boleh ditukar untuk dipadankan dengan mata anda dan ingin > Saiz Teks juga laras untuk muat pada skrin peranti anda > Bolehkah membersihkan Sejarah > Bolehkah Reset kepada tetapan lalai > Data maksimum digunakan > Anda boleh menggunakan ia sebagai Thesaurus juga Kamus terbaik Melayu untuk pelancong, Mans perniagaan, pemain, pelajar, kanak-kanak, guru-guru, pelajar, lelaki dan perempuan yang akan digunakan pada android telefon pintar. cuba aplikasi kami yang lain; melayu quran, waktu solat, lumba kereta, basikal turbo, serangan sniper, penembak, hadith Bukhari, hadith muslim, pemain video terima kasih untuk maklum balas dan penilaian anda.
release_text: Improved and fixed version. Some permissions are removed. Thanks for your support and feedback with ratings.

description: Kin-Tec Recruitment was established in 2001 as Kinetic Technical Ltd. - a specialist provider of Technical personnel to the Oil and Gas and Energy industries. With our UK head office overseeing the development of a strong client base covering locations all over the globe, Kin-Tec has seen expansion into both Ghana and Qatar with further growth into Australia in 2013. At the simple click of a button you are able to browse jobs, upload your CV and apply for positions matching your expertise and chosen location. Whether you are a contractor looking for work or a professional seeking career progression, Kin-Tec has a solution for you.

****This App is Available in ARABIC only**** تطبيق كرة قدم من ياهو مكتوب. يتيح لك متابعة مجريات مباريات كرة القدم مباشرة من جهازك الأندرويد: ★ تغطية حية لأهم الفرق والبطولات العربية و العالمية: كأس العالم 2014 في البرازيل، دوري ابطال أوروبا، الدوري الاسباني، الدوري الإيطالي، الدوري الانجليزي، دوري عبد اللطيف جميل السعودي و العديد من البطولات و الفرق الأخرى. ★ مجريات المباراة دقيقة بدقيقة: الأهداف، البطاقات الصفراء و الحمراء، التبديلات، ضربات الجزاء، ركلات الترجيح, إصابات ما قبل المباراة - التعليق الحيّ المكتوب. سنعرض تعليقات مفصلة للمباريات المهمة ★ تنبيهات الفرق و المباريات. ابحث عن زر التنبيهات في شاشة الفريق أو المباراة. التنبيهات تشمل: تذكير بموعد المباراة (قبل 60 دقيقة)، توفر تشكيلة الفريقين، بداية ونهاية المباراة، الأهداف والبطاقات الحمراء ★ معلومات عن المباراة: إداء الفريقين و المواجهات المباشرة, وقت المباراة، الملعب، سعة الملعب، خريطة الملعب، حكام المباراة ★ إحصائيات عن المباراة: تسديدات على المرمى، تسديدات خارج المرمى، نسبة الاستحواذ، التسللات، الركنيات، الأخطاء ★ إستعراض جميع مباريات الموسم السابقة و القادمة ★ قسم "البطولات" حيث يمكنك الآن إستطلاع جميع مراحل البطولات بسهولة تامة. يمكنك عرض ترتيب فرق الدوريات، و مراحل المجموعات و التصفيات، جدول مباريات الدوريات و البطولات, معلومات التأهل و الهبوط في جدول الترتيب ★ قائمة الهدافين. إضغط على زر الحذاء في الأعلى في قسم البطولات أو شاهد الهدافين من شاشة المباراة ★ تغطية إخبارية بتقارير مفصلة عن ** The Best Timer for Android ** Beautiful Timer is an elegant timer in Holo style, simple but especially powerful. Given its versatility, it can easily be used as a kitchen timer, parking timer or for any other action that requires a countdown like laundry, a nap, or simply cooking an egg. With this timer, you’ll be able to: ✔ Set unlimited Timers (PRO) ✔ Add or delete unlimited presets (PRO) ✔ Start a timer from the current widget on your desktop or lockscreen (PRO) ✔ Add a personalized ringtone for each timer (PRO) ✔ Quick timer ✔ Quickly add 30 sec./1 min. /5min. /10min. timers (PRO) The application also offers these fantastic features: ✔ Resistant to restarts of your cellphone ✔ Share the current timer via NFC ✔ *Non intrusive* notifications for each timer ✔ Notifications with Restart and Interrupt buttons (available only for the latest versions of Android) ✔ Notifications with running indicator ✔ Dirty hands? Move your hand over the telephone a couple of times to make the timer snooze. (PRO) Save your favorite times through the dedicated icon, and make them restart with a click using the widget or the blue ribbon.

description: A superb multi-layered parallax live wallpaper with beautiful hand-crafted, high-resolution scenes for you to choose from. *** FREE *** 3 beautiful scenes *** PRO *** 12 beautiful scenes *** Please check the video and/or images to check the scenes available in the FREE and PRO versions. *** -Extremely smooth and responsive gyro (and accelerometer) controlled multi-layered parallax live wallpaper -Self-levelling algorithm to re-centre scenes dynamically -Adjustable translational/rotational movement options to enhance the 3D effect -Cinema Mode – for hands-free, cinematic enjoyment of animated scene -Battery/performance optimized with framerate limiter -OpenGL ES2.0 hardware graphics optimized *** Instructions for use *** As this is a live wallpaper, it can be installed as follows: Home --> Menu --> Wallpapers --> Live Wallpapers *** NOTE *** PLEASE try out this FREE version before purchasing the PRO version to ensure it works perfectly on your device. description: Doctor App Improves: Marketing & Branding, Patient Education/Communication and Practice Efficiency Tell Your Patients in Your Office or on Your Marketing Commercials: “Download Me/Us on iTunes or Android” How cool is that? We make it happen! Contact us: company@cloudninedevelopment.com We Build Doctor App or Your Practice App in Days Cloud Nine Development, LLC Smartphones and Web Applications Should I have an App? Are Apps the next Web? Undoubtedly the answer is Yes. You could and should be the first in your specialty in your area to have an App for your patients and referring physicians. Your Doctor App could be your personalized smartphone application that could be downloaded by your patients from iTunes.com for Free. They will be able to find you on the iTunes App store by the name you choose (e.g. your name or practice name). Doctor App has various features from office hours, GPS enabled directions to office locations, contact information to patient education material. Doctor App could inform your patients about current events and services offered at your practice. Patients could contact your office for medical records, medication refills, or ask a technician a question right from your application on their phone. Patients or your referring physicians could request an appointment with you right from the phone through the Doctor App. By uploading relevant patient education material, a specialist could have their referring doctors use your application for patient education material and then refer patients to you. Here are some of the reasons why a Doctor App would be beneficial compared to a website: • User Interface customized to mobile phones and superior to web layout. • Ability of user/patients/public to have improved, increased access to their physicians. • Increased ability of the physician to reach out to their patients using a current news type function that will update each users application in real time. • Potential to reduce costs and save time. Users can contact/make requests of clinic/hospital staff without a phone call or in person contact. • Easy accessibility to physicians offices through GPS enabled map functions on the smartphone • Ability of users to be able to have immediate access to a phone directory and synced calling • Patients do not need to remember doctors or nurses names to navigate web and website • Personalized patient education material that can we emailed or hosted on the application, with similarly personalized patient education videos. The videos can be present on the app and referring physicians can have the patient look at it before they come to see the specialist. We believe Doctor App has the potential to improve practice marketing and branding, patient education and communication, and personal and practice efficiency. Cloud Nine Development, LLC (www.cloudninedevelopment.com) is a company managed by physicians and they have developed the Doctor App. Our first product is the “Eye Handbook” (www.eyehandbook.com), an iPhone application available on Apple’s iTunes store (www.iTunes.com). For further information or to give your thoughts about Doctor App please feel free to contact us at company@cloudninedevelopment.com or visit the company’s website at www.cloudninedevelopment.com (Fax: 1-888-602-5946).

description: Finding Jewish love just got easier! JCrush is a location-based free Jewish dating app where you can find, chat and meet with Jewish singles aka "crushes," near you. Jewish dating has never been so easy! Got a crush on someone? Swipe right to "Crush" them or swipe left to "Oy vey" and see the next nice Jewish boy or girl. Use our "Say Shalom" feature to say hi to someone you like without waiting for a match Get noticed right away! 1. Sign in with Facebook 2. Filter by gender, age, location or denomination 3. Start crushing If a crush is mutual, the app will connect users in a private chat and you take it from there! description: ************************************************************ Don't you think puppies are furry and cute? description: Monitor your weight using an efficient interactive chart ! " My weight tracker " will help you to achieve your ideal weight. You will easily see the weight loss and the gain on the chart. /!\ It is strongly recommended to make regular backups by email. This will avoid you to losing your datas in case of mishandling or crash of your device! The app show automatically your BMI and your Body Fat %. On the chart, you can display : - BMI zone - Body Fat % zone - Weight goal - Moving average - Trend curve On the chart you can also : - see weight - see note - see rate (food & sport) - see the difference between two points - Zoom (X and Y) - Scroll - Take a screenshot - Return to initial view by double tap - ... The home page show you : - Chart - Last weight - BMI - Fat Body % - Weight goal - Trend - Time-to-goal estimate - Weight to loose or gain to achieve the goal A widget is available in this version. This will provide you on the essential informations (Last weight, BMI, Fat Body %, weight goal, trend, time-to-goal estimate, and weight to loose or gain to achieve the goal). The weight log, will show you : - the loss or the gain between two month or two weight - the whole informations on the weight : BMI, Body Fat %, note and rate (sport and diet) You can export and import your datas (by email or on your sd card) in order to share them on your different devices. You can also make a backup on your sd card. "My weight tracker" is also suitable for pregnant women, but the BMI and Body Fat % are not adequate. v2.8 : - Issue fixed the height reported by an user v2.4 /2.5/2.6 : - Adding icone for the sport and food histogram - Bug fixed v2.3: - The scale of the curve and the scale bar are editable (Display optimized for smartphone or tablet in high definition) - Visualization of the objective advancement - Add of histogramm for the rate (food & sport) v2.1 / v2.2: - Auto-zoom on the whole chart (Chart preferences) - Little bug fix v2.0 : - Add weight with comment and rating (sport and food) - Colored curve based on ratings - Screenshot - Add password - Help (under construction) - Settings on the page "Add" and "History"

description: Kupujmo.si, vodilni regionalni portal za skupinsko nakupovanje, sedaj na voljo tudi kot Android aplikacija. Kupujmo.si vsak dan nudi ekskluzivne ponudbe izdelkov in storitev s popusti tudi do 90%. Wellness, spa in fitness centri, lepotni saloni, potovanja, kulturni in športni dogodki, kino, koncerti, tečaji jezikov, izobraževanje in ostalo so samo nekatere od storitev na katere uporabniki Kupujmo.si z unovčevanjem kuponov prejemajo visoke popuste. Kupujmo.si vam vsak dan prinaša popuste v mestih: Ljubljana, Maribor, Celje, Koper, Kranj in Novo mesto. Po principu skupinskega nakupovanja, se ponudbe realizirajo kadar se za nakup odloči zadostno število uporabnikov. Sedaj lahko hitro ter enostavno pregledujete ponudbe in z enim klikom nakupujete vam najljubše storitve in izdelke. Ponudbo lahko unovčite takoj, kar brez tiskanja kupona! V primeru, da ste uporabnik Kupujmo.si portala, se v aplikacijo prijavite z obstoječim uporabniškim imenom in geslom. V primeru, da še niste registrirani, lahko to naredite preko te aplikacije neposredno iz vašega Androida. Kupujmo skupaj, plačujmo manj! Copyright (c) 2012 Kupujmo d.o.o. Vse pravice pridržane.

PRACTICAL AND SIMPLE TASK PLANNING Creating new tasks is always simple to do, requiring only a few sequential steps to complete. Schedule Planner allows users to edit and change their individual tasks or by batch editing multiple tasks. Users can even create notes attached to each task if they need more details. Use our PLANNED vs ACTUAL task tracking functions to commit a task as being accomplish to chart your schedule accurately. See these results on the statistics screen. CATEGORIES AND STATISTICS Busy users are provided with a flexible set of categories like “Meals”, “Health”, and “Work”. Tasks are then color coordinated by category for convenience and to monitor their statistics. The app employs in-depth pie-chart and bar graph diagrams to let users see how they spend their time based on category with a quick glance. CALENDAR VIEW Tasks and full days can be planned in advance & viewed day-by-day via a practical graphic calendar or list view. See category colors mark each day on your calendar with planned tasks. EXPORT & BACKUP Keep track of your schedule by exporting your schedule via CSV or PDF along with notes. Also backup your data to the cloud to keep it safe and secure and to restore your data between devices. SYNC OPTIONS Sync your task lists with Google Calendar. ADVANCED SETTINGS Custom Categories to define your own breakdowns. Advanced Alerts and Notifications The world is busier than ever; take this opportunity to start optimizing your time and become more productive with Schedule Planner Classic! ________________ Schedule Planner Classic is developed by Digi117, Ltd.

With Shaw Go Family, Shaw and Shaw Direct subscribers get instant access to much-loved Family series – anytime, anywhere. Features: - Intelligent Streaming: Best-possible video quality at any connection speed, up to 720p HD over WiFi. - Video Bookmarking with Progress Bars: Stop a video and pick up right back where you left off… never miss a moment. - Parental Controls: For younger children, select TV ratings that require PIN access. - Social Sharing: Share your experience with friends using your favourite social media tools. - Smart Search: A predictive search and discovery tool that lets you find the content you want, faster. - App Tour: Instructional screens that show how to navigate the app. Functions: Using your Location Services (GPS and Network-based), the Shaw Go Family App will: - Enable streaming of live or available content in accordance with Shaw’s License Agreements; - Synchronize to the schedule in your current region through use of approximate and precise location retrieval. Using your Photo/Media/Files permissions, the Shaw Go Family App will: - Temporarily store, modify or delete the contents of your locally stored data on the device or externally to an applicable storage device as needed; - Test access to protected storage for the purpose of facilitating user data retrieval and use of content for registered devices, to facilitate technical assistance should network access be denied, and to increase the application productivity. Using your Network access permissions, the Shaw Go Family App will: - View connection information, see available Wi-Fi connections to enable the apps to connect to the Wi-Fi network; - Detect the network state, read the device status, detect running apps, view app history and identity; - Prevent the app from entering sleep mode; - Change network connectivity; - Enable the app to automatically adjust to user’s preferred network. Restrictions: - Access to the video content on Shaw Go Family is only available to Shaw and Shaw Direct television customers with an active subscription to Family.

Test your matching skills in this exciting, ultra addictive gem matching game, featuring multiple fun modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous gem packed levels as you try your hardest to master the game. From the developers who brought you the incredibly popular gem matching game 'Gem Collapse'! * NO IAP whatsoever. DELUXE VERSION FEATURES (You are looking at the deluxe version) * NO ADS! * Zen mode; relax, chill and play without the timer. * Good karma for supporting an Indie developer! ALL VERSION FEATURES * Highly addictive match-3 puzzle game play. * Stunning graphics, fully optmised for small, medium, large and extra large screens. * Three uniquely different and challenging modes; Arcade, Score Panic and Zen (deluxe only). * Multiple gem types; jewel, diamond, ruby, crystal, emerald and lots more. * Combo chains. * Lots of interesting and explosive power ups. * Automatic hint if you get really stuck (can be switched off). * Separate leader boards for each mode and a combined board to show who's really king or queen! * Each mode is easy to learn, yet hard to master. * Progress is saved in every mode - try out the different modes without losing your saves. ARCADE MODE Fast paced gem matching fun is on offer in the Arcade mode. Test your skill and reflexes as you race to destroy special gems and complete the level before the timer overpowers you. SCORE PANIC Can you reach the target score before your time runs out? The target score is increased after every level making this mode more and more challenging. Just don't panic! ZEN Relax and chill in Zen mode, without a timer to harry and panic, you can lay back and focus on an addictive, never ending game of match. GUARANTEE The loyalty and trust of our customers is very important to us. If you are not completely satisfied with a MeYuMe product then please contact us at meyume-games@xtremics.biz . JOIN US! ☆ Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/meyumeapps ☆ Twitter: http://twitter.com/MeYuMeApps ☆ Tweet: @MeYuMeApps ☆ Web: http://meyume.com GAME PLAY Match 3 games are puzzle games. You need to match 3 or more objects by exchanging two pieces in a horizontal or vertical direction. Matched pieces are removed from the board and new pieces dropped back onto the board. The object is to clear the board and advance to the next level. Matching more than 4 pieces can trigger the spawning of power ups with special abilities, helping you clear larger areas of the board. Massive scores can be quickly achieved by chaining together the matches, these are called cascading combos. Each new combo results in an increase in the score multiplier and continues until there are no more matches for that combo run.

description: This is a theme for Apex Launcher, Nova Launcher or Go Launcher EX it features custom icons and wallpapers. For Go Launcher it has custom menus and folders. It works on tablets and supports larger icons, see Theme tips below. GO LAUNCHER ISSUE: Go Launcher is no longer applying my themes at the moment. A work around is to go to Tools --> Preferences --> Icons --> Icon style and select the theme you want under Theme icon, Dock icon and folder icon. ** Themes cannot be launched directly. See Installation instructions below. ** Screen shots are using a 5 x 4 grid. (Menu → Preferences → Screen settings → Grid size) taken on Go Launcher. *** If you find bugs or have suggestions, Please do not post them as comments as I cannot reply to those and solve your issue. *** Please rate the theme. INSTALLATION • Make sure Nova Launcher or Go Launcher EX is compatible with your device and runs on your device before downloading. • Apex Launcher: Go to Apex Settings → Theme Settings → select the theme you just installed. • Nova Launcher: Go to Nova Settings → Look and Feel → select the icon pack of the LC Theme you just installed. • Go Launcher EX: to run, please make sure that Go Launcher EX runs on your device before installing. Once downloaded from the go launcher menu, select themes → Installed and then select LC Theme you just installed and press the Apply button. THEME TIPS • Nova Launcher / Go Launcher EX is required to run. • Themes cannot be run directly, you must apply the theme from a launcher. See instructions in the INSTALLATION section. GO LAUNCHER THEME TIPS • Make sure Nova Launcher or Go Launcher EX runs on your device before installing • If the icons do not update --> Quit Go Launcher and then start it again. --> Also make sure if you have apps on the SD card that the SD card is mounted. If this does not work, uninstall the theme and download and install it again. You will not be charged. • Go Launcher Sphere Effect: To enable the sphere effect as seen on the different themes, go to Go Launcher Preferences --> Effect Settings --> Select Horizontal or Vertical Scroll Effect --> select Sphere. • To move to the SD card you must be running Android OS 2.2 or higher. • To make icons larger go to Menu --> Preferences --> Visual Settings --> Icons --> Icons Size • Sample Tablet settings: https://sites.google.com/site/lcdroiddev/home/tablet-settings NOTE: WeatherBug Elite, Go Clock, Powerful Switchman, HD Widgets, widgetsoid are separate apps available on the Android Market. Widgets seen in some of the themes: • HD Widgets: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=cloudtv.hdwidgets&feature=search_result#?t=W251bGwsMSwxLDEsImNsb3VkdHYuaGR3aWRnZXRzIl0. • Go Clock Widget: https://market.android.com/details?id=smsr.com.acc • Analog Clock Widget: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.gau.go.launcherex.gowidget.clockwidget • Analog Clock Widget: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1107977 • Widgetsoid 2.x: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.jim2 • Powerful Switchman: https://market.android.com/details?id=cn.opda.android.switches • WeatherBug Elite: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.aws.android.elite Please check out my other themes. Weather in screen shot is Weather Bug Elite. Clock is from Analog Clock Collection or Go Clock WIdget Widgets are from Widgetsoid or HD Widgets. Themes cannot be launched directly. See Installation instructions. Keywords: LCDROIDDEV lc droid dev Pink Theme go nova apex launcher

app_name: Tasks To Do Free, To-Do List
description: A place for your tasks You have important tasks to do you don't want to forget? Then Tasks To Do is the place for them. Tasks To Do is the easy to use, full-featured task list app you need. You can store your tasks, sort and filter them very flexibly, set alerts, manage due dates and times etc. The pro version also syncs with Google Tasks and Toodledo. A trial version with all pro features is available at http://www.refined-apps.com For questions, remarks, suggestions or feedback mail us at support@refined-apps.com ---- Features ------------ ✓ As many task list views as you like ✓ Current design style ✓ Supports phones & tablets (split-screen layout etc.) ✓ Translations to English, German, French, Spanish, Japanese, Polish, Hungarian, Russian, Chinese Task fields ✓ Title ✓ Customizable Categories (for filtering and sorting) ✓ 5 Priority levels ✓ 4 Tasks states (Not started / started / waiting / done) ✓ Due date & time ✓ Repeating tasks ✓ Reminders / Alerts (including sound/vibration settings) ✓ Notes Widgets ✓ A widget supporting scrolling, resizing, light/dark theme ✓ "Icons-Only" widgets to add tasks and sync manually ✓ Fast task creation from widget ✓ Fast task creation by long-pressing the search button in any app ✓ Support for the Google Now "note to self" command ✓ Supports other calendar apps (e.g. HebDate Hebrew Calendar and OI Calendar Picker) ✓ Quick Search ✓ Voice recognition ✓ Flexible sorting options ✓ Flexible filter options (task state, due date, category, ...) ✓ Can display tasks of multiple categories in a single list (instead of a separate list per category/folder) ✓ Sharing of tasks (e.g. for printing, mailing, ...) ✓ Backup/Restore ---- Pro vs. Free Version ------------ Tasks To Do Pro includes all the features of Tasks To Do Free plus: ✓ Bidirectional synchronization of all your Google Tasks / gTasks lists ✓ Bidirectional synchronization with Toodledo (www.toodledo.com) . - Great to sync your tasks between your phone and your android tablet . - Tasks in Toodledo can be synced with many other tools (Google Calendar, Outlook, ...). For an overview, see http://www.toodledo.com/tools/directory.php ) ✓ More configuration options for the widgets ✓ Lockscreen widgets (Android >= 4.2) ✓ No ads You can easily transfer your tasks from the free to the pro version via the backup feature. ---- Requested Permissions ------------ ✓ "android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" to write backups on the sd-card ✓ "android.permission.VIBRATE" to be able to vibrate when an alert is triggered ✓ "android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED" to reactivate alerts after booting ✓ "android.permission.INTERNET" and "android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" to load ads ✓ "com.als.taskstodo.READ_TASK_DATA" and "com.als.taskstodo.WRITE_TASK_DATA" for protected access to Task To Do's task data
release_text: 2.5.7 Bugfix: alarms can be deleted again 2.5.2-2.5.6 + Material Style + New light and dark themes + Bug fixes 2.5.1 + Added font size setting + Added "change priority" to contextual actions + Added "Day after tomorrow" and "3 days later" to contextual action "change due date", moved up "select date" + Added widget setting "Show holo line" + Bug fixes + Library updates

Animal Memory Match is a addictive puzzle for kids and adults with Amazing HD Graphics! Comes with sounds for all animals! There are 3 game play levels: - Fun (Easy): 4 cards (2 pairs) - Enjoyable (Medium): 12 cards (6 pairs) - Tricky (Hard): 20 cards (10 pairs) Every time you start a level it will be different (different animals and different placements) so you can play the game as many times as you want and you won't be board. It is also fun for the kids since the animals change places every time! You will be times when you play to see how fast you can finish a level as well as how many tries it took to finish the level. Play and Score!

"Alpha Squadron blazes onto Android in full 3D aerial dogfighting glory, the graphics are slick and the gameplay is fast-paced" (Droid Gamers) "A pure action experience wrapped in a pretty package, the gameplay is incredibly fun and the controls work well" (Portable Gaming Region) "Feels like a spiritual successor to the wildly successful Rogue Squadron series" (Pocket Gamer) Jump into your Elysian starfighter and get ready to take on Hadian warbirds, Dropships armed to the teeth and gigantic battleships in a heroic struggle to defend the galaxy! Join up with Alpha Squadron and take on the evil Hadian Empire in this 3D Action flight game. With missions set in deep space as well as planetside sorties versus hordes of enemy fighters and capital ships, you will be immersed in the intergalactic conflict! Dogfight with enemy spaceships flying amidst beautiful floating cities, desolate desert planets and dangerous asteroid belts as you fight to stay alive and protect your fleet. Dodge the laser combat blasts as you provide cover for a planetary evacuation, capture an Imperial General and rescue prisoners of war. Launch your starfighter through a thrilling tunnel chase in a race against time to stop a galactic superweapon of doom! Awesome cinematic graphics and intense action packed gameplay!

description: "Everything I want from a platformer is right here in Cordy 2." - Kotaku — Try before you buy! — SilverTree Media is proud to introduce Cordy 2! The sequel to the hit games Cordy and Cordy Sky! After a long and harrowing journey, Cordy and Volt finally arrive at World 2, only to find it besieged by the evil Boogaloo. Help Cordy and Volt as they set off to save the Zap Drops from Boogaloo's evil minions, the Boogie Bots! Guide Cordy through 3 action packed and beautiful worlds! Fun-filled Carnival world, serene Harmony Harbor and epic Sky Factory! • Play the first 6+ levels for free! Enjoy 53 levels packed with gameplay in the full version! • PARENTS! It's possible to spend real money inside this game. Purchases are one-time and carry over between devices. • HOW TO RESTORE PURCHASES? Purchases are one-time and carry over between devices. To restore your purchases on a new device, go to the Settings menu from the game's Pause or Title screen, and tap on the Restore Purchase button. Even if you forget to do this step and try to buy the game again, it will be restored for free. • Meet New Friends: As Cordy and Volt battle their way through World 2, they meet many new friends to help them along in their journey! Team up with Magnet Bot, Smash Bot, Copter Bot and more! • CUSTOMIZE CORDY. Dozens of custom hats and colors are available to choose from! • COOL ACHIEVEMENTS. Earn badges for style. Do you have what it takes? • TRY THE ORIGINAL "CORDY" GAME, TOO! One of the Top 10 best games of 2011 -The New York Times. #1 app in the United States, Canada, China, Germany, France, Spain, and many more! Featured "Editor's Choice", "Staff Pick", and "Best Arcade & Action" by Android. • WANT MORE GAMES LIKE THIS? Play SLEEPY JACK! Top 10 Best of E3: "Adorable Psychonauts-esque presentation and solid gameplay...that is also tight and arcadey" -Pocket Gamer BEST APP OF THE WEEK: "It's the sort of happiness-inducing experience that you want to share with everyone." -Kotaku • STILL CAN'T GET ENOUGH CORDY? Try Cordy Sky! • 8 LANGUAGES. Supports Spanish, French, German, Italian, Korean, Chinese, and Japanese. Pick one of these in your phone's Settings menu. • 'LIKE' Cordy at facebook.com/CordyTheGame & follow SilverTree on Twitter @silvertreemedia • If you have any questions, let us try to help at cordy2support@silvertreemedia.com and we will do our best to help in any way! Thank you to our Android friends for naming SilverTree Media their "Top Developer!"
release_text: Thanks for continuing to make Cordy 2 a smash hit! This update contains minor bug fixes.

description: Big Fish is pleased to announce that Fairway Solitaire™ is back, and it's bigger and better than ever! One of the most exciting and addictive card games available includes solitaire hands dealt on more than 408 hand-crafted golf holes, 4 mini games, 37 trophies, a golf shop, golf announcers, hazard cards, and one SERIOUSLY ticked off gopher! "… an incredibly awesome puzzle game masquerading as solitaire." - Penny Arcade "It might look like a straightforward card game on the surface but there's much more to Fairway Solitaire thanks to its assured, inventive design. It's a hugely enjoyable, supremely polished strategic deck shuffler that should suit puzzle fans to a tee." PocketGamer: 8/10 Follow this hilariously sarcastic story of the gopher and his seething disdain and desire to put all golfers in their place! From beachside courses where palm trees sway, to the hustle and bustle of illuminated city courses, keep your eye on the prize because there is nowhere this gopher won’t follow. Score the best runs by clearing the card deck using the least amount of moves, and don’t forget about those mulligans! Whether scoring a double bogey or 3 under par, this hit will have you laughing so loud you’ll forget to be quiet on the golf course! TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME! ☆☆☆☆☆ Features ☆☆☆☆☆ ✓ Bright scenery and captivating artwork bring the classic to life! ✓ Delightful commentary and appealing sounds enhance game play ✓ Fill up your golf meter to earn helpful golf bucks ✓ Find Iron cards on the green to add to your golf bag ✓ Watch out for water, wedge, and rough cards that test your skills! ✓ Use your golf bucks for one iron, or fill your entire bag! ✓ Wild Shot cards can either make or break a terrific golf game! ☆☆☆ Discover more from Big Fish Games! ☆☆☆ Big Fish is the leading global marketplace to discover and enjoy casual games. You can enjoy our virtually endless selection of games anytime, anywhere — on your PC, Mac, mobile phone, or tablet. Learn more at bigfishgames.com! We have many other great Google Play games available. Just type in 'Big Fish Games' for more fun and adventure!

Brewing with Mash makes an all-grain recipe easy to start. Start your mash off right with this simple homebrew tool by determining the right temperature to set your water to. Mash temperatures are critical to the brew process and by getting them right means less time fiddling with heat. This strike calculator adjusts on the fly and is a perfect homebrewing app for the beginner or advanced all-grain brewer. NEW! MASH TUN HEATLOSS COMPENSATION: Enter your mash-tun's thermal mass to adjust for heat loss when you are not heating your mash-tun to the strike temperatures. FEATURES: • Fahrenheit & Celsius • Metric & US Measurement Scales • Mashtun Heatloss Compensation (Advanced Setting) HOW TO USE: Swipe left and right between 3 screens that control grain, water and desired temperature. Drag the grain and water levels up and down, spin the temperature on the thermometer to set and calculate target and strike (infusion) temperatures. Use the + and - buttons to nudge each measurement. Use the info button to help learn what to do in each screen. TO CALCULATE TEMPERATURES: 1 - Enter your grain weight and grain temperature 2 - Enter volume of water 3 - Set the desired temperature to see calculated strike (infusion temperature) WHY USE IT: Different homebrew recipes may call for different infusion temperatures and methods. Stop approximating and start your mash off right with Mash. Over or undershooting your infusion temperatures cost you time, effect your efficiency and can change the flavor profile. Get right in the temperature zone the first time and save yourself from scrambling and adjusting.
release_text: 2.01 • All New Touch Interface • New Calculation Algorithm • Mash-tun Heatloss Compensation (thermal mass compensation) • No Longer Requires Adobe Air to Run 1.2.47 • Faster Simulation • Improved Directions • Updated Metric Slider Layout 1.2.05 • User Preference/Setting Menu Addded • Celsius Temperature Scale Added • Metric Measurement Scales Added 1.1.65 • Updated Graphics and Icons

description: This app provides endless letter practice worksheets for kids who are learning their ABCs. The drawing engine is the same one as our award winning Color & Draw for kids. They can choose from many colors, add stickers, change the stroke size. There are undos and multiple erasers too.

Do you have nerves of steel and a calm head in times of danger? Then 3D airport fire truck simulator will put you on the edge of your seat. Join one of the most respected careers in the world in 3D Airport Fire Truck Simulator. In this fire- fighting simulation game you’ll be rescuing people trapped in plane crashes, dousing the flames of the burning planes and even make sure the planes are safe. On a modern airport thousands of travellers are in a close proximity environment. So nowhere else the dangers are more apparent than on a modern airport. For a airport fire is one of the most ferocious foes! The risks are very great and therefore a airport needs a elite squad of airport firefighters! 3D Airport Fire Truck Simulator is a new exciting driving simulator game where you can learn the ropes the most elite squad of airport firefighters. Drive around in a nice 3D driving simulator environment. Find your path around the modern airfield , watch out for the planes on the airstrip and other vehicles on the airport. Being a member of an elite squad firefighters means a lot of training. So i this new driving and firefighter simulation 3D game you can learn everything you need if you ever like to be a real fireman and drive around in a fire truck. find the planes that are burning and start hosing them down till the fire is put out. Respond as fast as possible to fire alerts before your mission failed. Some of the planes and items on the airport caught fire, you need to drive the fire truck towards the fire and operate the fire equipments to put them out in time. The situation is very critical never before a fire is more dangerous than on a real life airport. You have to try your best to put out the fires successfully. How to play 3D Airport fire truck simulator : - Rotate the steering wheel to steer the fire truck left or right - To shift the fear tap it forward or tap again to go in reverse - To switch between camera modes tap the camera icon and the view changes - Press the gas pedal to accelerate the fire truck forward or backwards - To break the fire truck in this driving simulation game press the break button How to operate the water cannon: - When nearby the fire use the the touch steering to aim the cannon - The water meter displays how much water in the tank of your fire truck remains - Press the spray button to fire the water on top of the fire itself - Tap the fire extinguisher icon to switch to fire equipment operations panel. - Tap the steering icon to switch back to 3D driving mode 3D Airport fire truck simulator is a realistic driving simulator game that allows you to drive a 3D fire truck on a airport. Become a real fireman i one of the most dangerous places to work as a firefighter on the airport in 3D Airport fire truck simulator. Be fast because time is not on your side Drive your fire truck can be a very difficult task! You as an firefighter will experience how it feels to really drive a fire truck. VascoGames is therefore happy to bring you this new 3D Airport fire truck simulator. description: ► NEW: Apps based on the bestselling "Laura's Star" series by Klaus Baumgart ► Over 7.5 million books in the series sold worldwide ► Recommended by the German magazine "ELTERN family" With the interactive features of this app, children can experience "Laura's Secret" in a whole new way, diving directly into the story. Readers can build Laura and Tommy's kite, set the table, mow the lawn, and fly the kite around obstacles. Numerous animations and funny sound effects enrich the experience. FEATURES -------------------------------------------------------------------------- - More than 80 animated scenes, funny sound effects, and exciting interactive options for children - Lovingly drawn illustrations by the popular children’s book illustrator Klaus Baumgart - Read-aloud function included: Captivating story-telling by native speakers - Appropriate for children: No in-app purchases - Intuitive, child-friendly controls - Language options: German, English, and Chinese (Mandarin) CONTENTS -------------------------------------------------------------------------- Laura has a wonderful secret: She is friends with a star! But there's something that's worrying her - if she loses the kite race, she'll have to tell that show-off Harry Ballwanz her secret. And Laura's kite simply will not fly! Can her star help her? Other children's apps from Bastei Entertainment: -------------------------------------------------------------------------- - Laura's Star - Laura's Christmas Star - Laura's Journey to the Stars Additional books in the "Laura's Star" series are in development! SUPPORT -------------------------------------------------------------------------- "Laura's Secret" has been extensively and meticulously tested on various devices. If you experience any technical difficulties, we would be happy to assist you. Please send an email to our support team at app.support@luebbe.de so that we can promptly address your concerns. Please note that we cannot provide immediate support when problems are posted as comments; for a quick response, please use the email address provided. We are always happy to receive general feedback and suggestions for improvements to the app! The Bastei Entertainment team hopes that you enjoy "Laura's Secret"!

description: Introducing a new OSM app that easily records house numbers for OpenStreetMap! Keypad-Mapper 3 makes it easy for you to record the GPS coordinates of house numbers for adding them later to OpenStreetMap. This app is the 3rd generation Keypad-Mapper available for the OSM community, and improves on the older generations. ★★★ Features: ★★★ ▶ records house numbers ▶ saves address data ▶ takes GPS photos for entering in JOSM ▶ indicates the GPS reception strength of GPS and GLONASS ▶ exports the recorded information ★★★ Why record house numbers for OSM? ★★★ Free navigation software requires free map data, and although the free OSM data provides a good basis for navigation programs, they are only as good as their data. This is why house numbers are essential to building a reliable map database in OSM. With this app anyone can help compile house numbers for the OSM database by simply installing the app! Not only is it contributing to a great open source project, it’s also fun, entertaining, and easy to do while you’re walking the dog or out for a stroll. The collected data can be added directly to OpenStreetMap. All you need to do is set up an account at www.openstreetmap.org, edit the acquired house numbers, and upload the data to OSM. After only a few minutes, the world’s new acquired house numbers are displayed in OSM. Custom ROMs are not supported. More information: http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Keypad-Mapper_3
release_text: 13.06.2012 ▶ audio note button allows the user to record a voice memo and save it along with a GPS coordinate ▶ record button allows user to start/stop recording ▶ optimised screen layout for larger devices/tablets ▶ improved usability (bigger characters, better contrast, R/F/L on keypad screen replaced by arrows) ▶ additional settings option: turn off GPS ▶ bug fixing ▶ Available for devices with only one camera (e.g. Nexus 7) ▶ App2SD

ZyMi is the best metronome for Android: accurate, lightweight, colorful and easy to use. Whether you play the guitar, piano, drums, or you are a singer, a good metronome is always the best companion in your playing/studying sessions. Features: - Z-Dial with haptic feedback lets you easily select tempo - Discover bpm by tap - Blink mode - First beat accent - Disabled screen locking (the screen brightness decreases for battery saving after a while) - Very accurate, precise and responsive - Customizable appearance This version of ZyMi metronome is ad-supported, thus requires some permissions. If you don't know what a metronome is: it's a tool for musicians, which plays a steady beat and helps keeping a consistent tempo while performing. About inappropriate ads: I have no control over the ads served. If you think they are not appropriate, there's the ad-free version. It's unfair to leave negative comments not to pay $1!

description: [Overview] ALSong is a free music player that displays the lyrics of the music playing. Free lyrics that are uploaded by the users are shown along with the music. Not only local music files like MP3 and FLAC, you can login to the Bugs Music then listen to the streaming music or download music files to play it. * ALSong Android TV Version * Listen to your music in Google Drive on your Android TV using the newly added Cloud Music function with ALSong synchronized lyrics. [Features] 1. Free Live Lyrics - ALSong Music Player automatically finds the lyrics of the music file playing (such as MP3) then show it along with the music. The lyrics are cashed so data connection is not needed to see the lyrics the next time the same song is played. 2. Display Auto Tagged Lyrics - If ALSong cannot show the lyrics in server or IRC lyrics, ALSong automatically displays the song’s lyrics tag if it exists in the music file. Only works when Auto Tag Lyrics is ON in Preferences. 3. Playlists - Add your favorite songs to ALSong Playlist. You can create more than one playlists. Both local files like MP3 and Bugs streaming music can be added. 4. Share via Twitter - You can post what song you are listening and your comment to twitter from ALSong. 5. Widget Supported - You can create a widget of ALSong music player on the home screen. 6. Timer - You can set the time for ALSong to be terminated. The option is under Preferences. 7. Section Repeat - You can set a starting point and an end point then repeat the section. 8. Lyric Finder - If you want to search a lyric, you can search it then apply it to the music playing. It is useful if your local MP3 file cannot find the lyric automatically. 9. Bugs Streaming Music - ALSong Music Player embeds Bugs Music service. By logging in, you can listen to the online streaming music. If you don’t have the music file in MP3, connect to this service then listen to the music! 10. Equalizer (EQ) - Equalizer (EQ) function to customize the sound quality. 11. Android TV Support - Listen to your music in Google Drive using the Cloud Music function in Android TV. - Synchronized lyrics of ALSong Mobile can also be used in ALSong Android TV. [FAQ] 1. Control on Notifications is too big. - You can resize it by dragging with two fingers (Supported only in Android 4.1 or higher) 2. I cannot see my music files added. - Press the “Scan Music Files” option in Preferences then the newly added music files will be added to ALSong. The more files you have in your phone, the more time will be spent to be scanned. 3. Lyrics and music does not match. - Try finding a different music using the Lyric Finder. 4. I cannot find Random playing and Repeat All function. - Tap on the button on the bottom left of the player screen. Each tap will change the mode to 1) repeating this song, 2) repeat every song one more time and 3) repeat every song. Tap on the button on the right to change the mode to sequential playing and random playing. The mode is on if the button turns blue. [System Requirements] Android 2.2, 2.3, 4.0, 4.1, 4.2, 4.3, 4.4
release_text: Listen to your music in Google Drive on your Android TV using the newly added Cloud Music function with ALSong synchronized lyrics.

description: See this week's earthquakes with magnitude 4 and above all around the world! Oz Quake is an earthquake monitoring app which displays the latest earthquakes reported over last 7 days by multiple international agencies. The features: # List of recent earthquakes with time, magnitude, distance to epicenter and depth. # Earthquake details and additional info. # A map with all earthquakes. # Optionally can display most active volcanoes and volcanoes active this week. # Optionally can display tectonic plates boundaries. # Standard, satellite or hybrid map. # Change measurement units. # Multiple data sources: - US Geological Survey (USGS), - European-Mediterranean Seismological Centre (EMSC), - GeoScience Australia, - GeoNet (NZ), - Helmholtz Centre Potsdam (GFZ), - Natural Resources Canada (NRC), - British Geological Survey (BGS). Stay tuned - more features are coming! Keywords: -earthquake,earthquakes,richter,seismic,tsunami,usgs,tremor,magnitude,disaster,volcano,aftershock,fault,news,info,epicenter

description: You don't want to unlock your device each time to see your upcoming calendar events? Then you should install LockscreenCalendar! This app puts your upcoming appointments directly on your lockscreen! It works on every lockscreen, that normally displays the next upcoming alarm, like all standard Android lockscreens. Samsung and HTC Sense lockscreen aren't such ones - nothing I can do about that until Samsung & HTC implement this standard feature in their modified lockscreens. You need to press "update" at least once to make the app load your calendar and set the text on the lockscreen. If you want the time of the events to be shown, change the date format in the app's settings (HH:mm for example). Again: DOES NOT WORK ON SAMSUNG, HTC OR OTHER MODIFIED LOCKSCREENS!! Only stock AOSP Android 2.x!! In newer Android versions the lockscreen layout changed dramatically so this app won't work on these - there is nothing I can do about that! ------------ Feature graphic icon: © spiderflystudios.com App icon: © aboutpixel.de Bernd Boscolo ------------ Permissions: READ_CALENDAR - needed to read the calendar WRITE_SETTINGS - needed to write on the lockscreen RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED - needed to start refresh timer after boot
release_text: 1.3.2: bugfix 1.3.1: fix: still showing one event less then setup on some devices 1.3: - fix: showing too less events in some cases - fix: not showing events without end time - fix: showing events from the past day - should now also work on Android 2.1

description: Please note: This is an unofficial third party application designed to input cheats into the GTA Vice City game. The game is not included. Opens up the keyboard in game and displays a list of cheats available. No need for a physical keyboard anymore, everyone can cheat. Important: On some devices the game is unable to handle the cheats and will close often. If this happens too often for your liking you have 15 minutes to refund using the play store. To minimise this issue use the cheats just after “loading” a save not “resuming”. Instructions 1. Open cheater app and press “Start Cheater”. 2. Start the game. 3. While in game press the new “Cheat” button at the top of the screen. 4. Find the cheat you want. 5. Enter it in the on screen keyboard that opens. 6. When you finish playing, open the cheater app again and press “Stop Cheater” to remove the “Cheat” button. Please note: Some combinations of cheats can cause the game to close e.g. spawning too many cars in one location and using multiple weapons cheats at once.
