description: SShutdown is a SSH command executor that allows you to shutdown your PC remotely. Since it connects with SSH no additional server is required, all you have to do is setup SSH access to your computer and authorize your mobile user to run certain commands like 'shutdown'. SSHutdown has a super simple user interface. Setup your host and the corresponding command you want to execute and push the big red button. At the current development stage SSHutdown suits best for commands that you don't want to send at high frequency. So you won't be able to script your mousepointer right now. But depending on user acceptance and my motivation I might add session management in the future. Right now 1 command is 1 SSH session. Simple as that. SSH ==== SSH is easily available on any platform and there is plenty information out there on the internet and even on youtube how to setup SSH access to your computer so you can share files or communicate. After you have setup the SSH connection to your PC successfully, or if you already had it setup before you can right away execute any command remotely on your PC using SSHutdown. If you need help just google for "ssh setup" and append your operating system, e.g. "ubuntu, windows, mac". On some systems you might have to set execution permissions to the user you whish to connect to. Also using the full path to execute a command from your Filesystem might help solving issues. SSHutdown fully relies on your support. Also the full version has better CPU performance because it does not show adds so consider buying it please. Raspberry PI ========== Many users have found SSHutdown a useful tool to control their Raspberry Pi Computer. It brings you a very simple and useful way to execute arbitrary commands on any sort of remotely accessible device with SSH support having a unique remote control. Outlook ====== Future releases of SSHutdown are planned to provide a faster interface, widgets and file navigation, sftp access and terminal console emulation. Part of this is planned for this year, depending on how much time and resources I can spare. SSHutdown is more ================= With SSHutdown you can connect to your computer very easily and run any command you like. You can remote control your PC at ease. With a little bit of coding knowledge you can essentially setup anything to run when you hit that big red button. Now try it yourself! * This is the free version. It is ad supported.
release_text: January 2013 - Fixed ActionBar support. Menu accessible on new devices without menu button now (Nexus7).

description: NOW WITH OVER 100 BRITISH BIRDS With wonderful pictures, sounds, quiz and checklist. Whether you’re a bird lover or just plain curious, BirdsUK’s high quality images will let you identify over 100 of the most commonly seen birds in Britain. It’s easy to find the bird you’re after and the information is where you want it exactly when you need it - which is when you’re out and about. Now with double the number of birds, these great features remain: Top quality photos of each bird, showing seasonal variations and the differences between males, females and young (as possible). Two quizzes - a sound quiz and a picture quiz, making this a fun way to learn while you play. Both song or call (as appropriate) for each bird. These can be accessed both from the main index page and the individual bird page. Check boxes so you can mark a bird as seen. A precis of key information about each bird, including facts and figures and where to find them. A link from each bird to it’s Wkipedia page for more info. Thanks for all the reviews praising the photography. The companion apps, TreesUK and DogsBreedsUK are out as well.

Springtime and Easter come to your Android device along with a cute interactive Teddy Bear. This is a FREE LITE version of the wallpaper, while the FULL version includes a lot of features and options. As expected, in the Full version Teddy will be watching your actions at day time and will be sleeping at night. You can select a background and accessories for him. Double tapping the toy toggles its glowing. In addition, you can play with Teddy by tickling his legs, belly, and head. You can wake up Teddy at night time by changing virtual screens. Once you stop switching screens, he will fall asleep again after a while. Visit us on Facebook - http://facebook.com/leensworkshop Follow us on Twitter - http://twitter.com/LeensWorkshop IMPORTANT NOTE: If you're experiencing any issue with the wallpaper don't hesitate to contact us by email - leen.developer@gmail.com . In 99% of cases we cannot resolve an issue reported as a comment. Full version features: ---------------------------- - Day and night mode. You can turn on day time or night time or enable the auto mode, which will change day to night and night to day at the time you chose; - Three amazing quality backgrounds to select from; - Accessories (boots, scarfs, necklaces); - Four beautiful soft toys and four stylish caps; - "Direct Settings" button. An optional button located right on the screen for instant access to the wallpaper settings. Device features: ---------------------- - Full support for portrait and landscape orientations; - Efficient battery consumption. The wallpaper is rendered only when it is really visible; - An ability to limit the number of frames per second to prolong battery life; - Can be moved to the SD card; - Requires OpenGL ES 2.0.

GPS navigator with offline maps for France. This is a free app that doesn't need an internet connection for the maps. You can search addresses or points of interest. It's easy to get routing to your destination. You can get a list of points of interest for tourists, accommodation, parking, restaurants, bars, clubs, cinemas, theatres, auto services, shops, parks, schools, hospitals, sport areas. The application has detailed maps of major cities in France: Paris, Marseille, Lyon, Toulouse, Nice, Nantes, Strasbourg, Montpellier, Bordeaux, Lille, Rennes, Le Havre, Reims, Saint-Etienne, Toulon, Grenoble, Angers, Dijon, Brest, Le Mans and others. This application is based on Osmand project under the GNU GPLv3 license and uses high quality data from OSM.

DODGE ALL THE CUBES!

description: Did you miss flappy bird? Installing so many flappy bird clones, but laggy or full of ads? You've come to the right place! The gameplay is original, no modification that will ruin the feel of flappy bird. 3. It's more rewarding, when your bird dies, you will get experience, and when you get enough experience you will level up, and sometimes get items. 4. It's customizable, the items you get from leveling up can be used to customize your game, changing the pipe, the bird, the background, etc. Well, you can simply say: "it's a more rewarding flappy bird" Credits, because I won't claim that I made everything: http://www.templateswise.com/ for free music loops. http://www.freesound.org/people/jorickhoofd/sounds/180350/ for the nooo sound. http://www.freesound.org/people/fmaudio/sounds/152997/ for the laugh sound. http://www.freesound.org/ for other sounds with 0 licenses, sorry I forgot the link... and most importantly: http://www.kilobolt.com/ for the awesome tutorial :) PS: If you think I forgot to credit your stuff, or maybe you want your stuff to be removed from this game, please contact me at reza@mirwanda.com thank you. For more information, visit Mirwanda Center at http://www.mirwanda.com

Jolly Roger pirate flag waving in thunderstorm! A live wallpaper app with 16 different pirate flags! Real pirate flags used by famous pirate like Edward Low, Blackbeard etc! APP HIGHLIGHTS ============== ✔ Real OpenGL 3D animation! Not a video loop or animated gif! ✔ Fully interactive! Shake phone, blow wind or touch screen to let the pirate flag fly! ✔ Floating cloud, thunderstorm, snowing, starry night etc animated background effect! ✔ Old and tattered flag! ✔ Different flag texture! ✔ Lighting control! ✔ Use own image as flag! ✔ Draw, write or sign on flag! ✔ Use own photo as background! ✔ Use own audio file as national anthem! ✔ Use battery level to simulate wind strength! ✔ Capture screenshot with Snap! and send to friend! ✔ Optimize for both tablet and phone, portrait and landscape mode! ✔ Set as live wallpaper or run as standalone app! PIRATES INCLUDED ================== ✔ Edward England ✔ Blackbeard ✔ John Quelch ✔ Captain Dulaien ✔ Bartholomew Roberts ✔ Bartholomew Roberts new ✔ Jack Rackham ✔ Edward Low ✔ Stede Bonnet ✔ Christopher Condent ✔ Henry Every red ✔ Henry Every black ✔ Christopher Moody ✔ Thomas Tew ✔ Richard Worley ✔ Emanuel Wynne IMPORTANT HINTS ================== * Tap screen twice to start/stop wind! PERMISSION =============== * Hardware permission is used for blow wind detection. About Jolly Roger ================== The Jolly Roger is any of various flags flown to identify a ship's crew as pirates. The flag most commonly identified as the Jolly Roger today is the skull and crossbones, a flag consisting of a human skull above two long bones set in an x-mark arrangement on a black field. This design was used by several pirates, including Captains Edward England and John Taylor.Some Jolly Roger flags also include an hourglass, another common symbol representing death in 17th- and 18th-century Europe. Despite its prominence in popular culture, plain black flags were often employed by most pirates in the 17th-18th century. Historically, the flag was flown to frighten pirates' victims into surrendering without a fight, since it conveyed the message that the attackers were outlaws who would not consider themselves bound by the usual rules of engagement—and might, therefore, slaughter those they defeated (since captured pirates were usually hanged, they did not have much to gain by asking quarter if defeated). CREDITS ======= Some background scene use in this app are from creative commons. Below are their respected links. Thanks for sharing such great photos! http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Th%C3%A9odore_Gudin-Combat_d%27un_vaisseau_fran%C3%A7ais_et_de_deux_gal%C3%A8res_barbaresques_mg_5061.jpg http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Ship_wreck1.JPG

Ваше чадо не оторвать от планшета? Совместим приятное с полезным ! Обучающая программа для изучения грамматики и правил русского языка уникальным методом. Программа ориентирована на младший школьный возраст, но может быть полезна даже взрослым. Содержит 280 фраз с ключевыми правилами. Работать с программой очень просто: Нажмите на символ из нижнего ряда и кликом поместите его в верхнюю строку. После заполнения всех пропусков выберите “Проверить”. Если Вы все сделали правильно, то можно нажать на каждую заполненную букву и увидеть правило. Нажмите "Вперед", чтобы увидеть следующую фразу. Немного теории: Головной мозг человека каждую ночь стирает 96% информации, которую мы получили за очередной день. И только 4% остается с нами утром. Это либо некие сильные впечатления, либо то, что многократно повторялось за прошедший день. Для полного освоения материала рекомендуем пользоваться приложением каждый день в течение пары недель, но не более 10-15 минут каждый день. Идеальный вариант – два-три раза в день, суммарное время не более 30 минут. После нескольких недель 90% материала будет крепко усвоено и можно будет снизить интенсивность занятий до 1-2 раз в неделю. Принимаются конструктивные предложения по дальнейшей доработке программы. Поверьте, Ваши отзывы очень важны для нашей молодой команды! Your child does not detach from the plate? Compatible with pleasure! Training program for learning grammar and rules of Russian language unique method. The program is aimed at primary school age, but may be useful even for adults. Contains 280 phrases with key regulations. The program is very simple: Click on the symbol in the bottom row and click to place it in the top row. After filling all the gaps, click "Check". If you did everything correctly, you can click on each letter and see the completed rule. Click "Next" to see the next phrase. Some theory: the human brain erases every night 96% of the information we got for the next day. And only 4% remains with us in the morning. It's either some strong impressions, or that repeated many times in the past day. To fully exploit the material recommend to use the application every day for a couple weeks, but no more than 10-15 minutes each day. Ideal - two to three times per day, total time of no more than 30 minutes. After several weeks of 90% of the material is hard and can be assimilated to reduce the intensity of training to 1-2 times a week. Accepts constructive suggestions on the further development of the program. Believe me, your feedback is very important for our young team!

The "Speaking Alphabet (Russian)" program is intended for training of children under control of parents to learn letters, writing words and reading. It is the convenient training program for joint lessons of parents with children where the adult sets tasks and helps the child to be guided with the world of letters, sounds and syllables. The speaking alphabet will help to remember to the child Russian letters, and their various writing look and sound: upper and lower case, hand-written and printing style. Why we recommend this program: 1 . Color letters draw attention from kids 1.5 years old to preschool children of 7 years old. 2 . Colors allow the child to remember better letters and to learn difference from vowels and consonants. 3 . Opportunity to make words of letters, without possessing skills of the writing. 4 . The child can visually see and compare various writing of the same letter. 5 . Possibility of sound reproduction of the written words, phrases. 6 . Selecting by color of parts of words at listening allows the fastest studing of a pronunciation of syllables and sounds. 7. Two operating modes: the alphabet and syllables depending on landscape or portrait orientation of the screen. Always it is possible to find time to work with the child with your phone or tablet. We give you opportunity to learn letters together. These are your children and it is better to teach them to basic knowledge by yourself! The program works at devices with Adobe AIR support and screen resolution 800x480 and more. If you doubt the device, check it and install Adobe AIR separately. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adobe.air It is recommended to use tablets with more than 7" the screen for work with syllables in portrait orientation mode.

Taiwan GuideWithMe is an offline travel guide, which recommends detailed articles around the country in relation to your current location. Developed by travelers and for travelers, GuideWithMe is a rich source of general travel info as well as off the beaten track advice. Get around guides, phrase lists, warnings how to stay safe and healthy, restaurants and hotel recommendations, local costs and taxes, road rules and a variety of other info are carefully stored in one app. Essentially complete articles with multiple hotel and restaurant listings are suggested for Taipei, Taichung, Tainan, Taoyuan and other travel destinations. • USE OFFLINE. Save money on roaming fees and refer to the articles even if you are offline and cellular data is not available. • DISCOVER ARTICLES RELATIVE TO YOUR LOCATION. Switch between country, region, city, travel topic articles recommended for your travel destination and current location. Taiwan travel guide contains around 90 articles covering the whole country. • GET RELIABLE INFO. All info comes from wikivoyage project, which is constantly updated by adventurous travelers and aspiring writers. Articles are vividly illustrated with more than 160 well­ chosen pictures and images. • VIEW ON THE MAP. GuideWithMe is based on map data, provided by MAPS.ME, offline maps app. An option to view the place on offline map is offered. With MAPS.ME you will always have maps of any countries in your pocket. We are waiting for any advice and feedback about GuideWithMe app. This will help to suit GuideWithMe app to your expectations and tastes. Your reviews and ratings are always welcome. Send them to android@guidewithme.com or leave a feedback in Google Play review section. Up to traveling to Italy, France, Spain, Russia, Turkey, Switzerland, Japan, Hawaii or other parts of the world? Check out our travel guides: http://guidewithme.com/ Follow us! Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/guidewithme Google+: http://plus.google.com/+Guidewithme/ Twitter: @GuideWithMe Enjoy your travels!

Wifi file transfer between your smartphone or smartphone and computer by WiFi, is a File Manager that let you do Download/Upload files and folders using the same WiFi network or WiFi HotSpot function of smartphones, so you can exchange files with the speed of WiFi anywhere, also on the road. * Sending entire folders including subfolders it's possible only using the send button after selecting the data to be sent, instead, holding down a folder and then clicking on share you will use the sharing features integrated int the system that simply to send only the files in the folders. • The version for pc, mac and linux is available on producer's website ( http://www.bertolamidev.com ), to be able to exchange also data between your phone and computer and it’s totally free and without any restrictions. • It also works using a smartphone as "WiFi Router" and connecting the others to it (also works on the one used as a router). • Using functions for sending and receiving internal at the program, folders sent will be received completed of sub-folders, you can also send empty folders and subfolders, this is to ensure that you receive all that you've send as it is. • You do not need the introduction of any IP address but simply choose from a list of available users, you just need to type a possible password access. • It is a file manager in every aspect with which it is possible to select multiple files and folders. • It is integrated with other multimedia applications from which you can share contents such as images, videos and music. • Multiple and simultaneous download and upload in the background with progress in notification bar. IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEM, INSTEAD OF PUTTING NEGATIVE FEEDBACK IMMEDIATELY, PLEASE CONTACT US ON bertolamidev@gmail.com , YOU WILL BE HELPED IN A DAY. app_name: Mynd: 興味にマッチする記事を届けるニュースアプリ
description: 【ver2.0 Android Wear対応！いますぐ試そう】 Android Wear端末を持っている人は、このアプリを本体のAndroidデバイスにインストールするだけで、あなたのWear端末でもMyndが使えるようになります。手元でニュースをウォッチしよう。 ※時計盤を左スワイプすることで、本体の「あとで読む」リストに追加されます。「あとで読む」リストは、「My朝刊」「My新着」の隣に現れます。 ① 毎朝届く厳選ニュース「My朝刊」 いつも忙しいあなたに。毎朝あなたにぴったりマッチした数十記事が届きます。「あなた専用の朝刊1面」です。 ② 新しい発見に満ちたタイムライン「My新着」 情報に敏感なあなたに。すき間時間に、最新ニュースをリアルタイムにチェックできます。 もちろん、あなたが興味を持ちそうな情報が選ばれて配信されます。 さらにMyndなら、まだ話題になっていないニュースも見つけ出してくれます。 誰も知らない情報を、Myndで見つけましょう。 ★★Myndの特徴★★ 1. 高度な機械学習アルゴリズム 興味のあるニュースを読んでいくだけで、Myndはどんどんあなたを理解していきます。さらにTwitterやFacebookなどのアカウントと連携すると、推薦の精度はぐっと増します。 使い続けるうちに、あなただけのMyndが育ちます。 2. シンプルでミニマルなインターフェース 見えないところで複雑な計算をしていても、届けるときには綺麗に整理。まるで有能なアシスタントのような仕事をするのがMyndです。 タブもカテゴリも無いすっきりした画面で、気持ちよく情報を摂取できます。 3. 知識を深める関連記事 Myndは関連記事も表示。流し読みする中で、気になった記事の深堀りや知識の消化を助けます。さらに、FacebookやTwitterなどのSNSでいいね！した記事や、Evernote、Pocket、はてなブックマークに過去に保存した記事も思い出させてくれます。 ★★こんな方におすすめ★★ ・情報収集を効率化したい人 ・普段から新聞や雑誌を読んでいる人 ・スキマ時間を活用したり、暇つぶしをしたい人 ・趣味の知識やおもしろネタ、雑学を仕入れたい人 ・知識を深く吸収したい読書家 ・誰も知らない情報を収集したいブロガーやライター ・電車での通勤時間や待ち時間を有効活用したいビジネスパーソン ・Wikipediaをどんどん辿るWikipediaサーフィンをしたことがある人 ・就活で業界研究・企業研究をしたり、時事ニュースを読みたい学生・就活生 ・Feedly, Flipboard、RSSリーダーアプリを使いこなしている情報通 ・日経新聞、毎日新聞、朝日新聞、産経新聞などの新聞アプリを使っている人 ・SmartNews(スマートニュース)、Gunosy(グノシー)、NewsPicks(ニューズピックス)、Antenna(アンテナ)、vingow(ビンゴー)、kamelio(カメリオ)、LINE NEWS(LINEニュース)、Yahoo!(ヤフー) ニュース、mixi(ミクシィ)ニュースなどを使いこなすキュレーションアプリマスター ★★あらゆるジャンルに自動で対応★★ Myndはあなたの好みを自動で学習。だから、難しい設定をすることなく読みたい記事だけが読める。ジャンルにとらわれない新しいニュース・リーダーです。 ・政治、経済、社会、国際、金融といったビジネスニュースも。 ・ネットやガジェット、ベンチャーやスタートアップといったテクノロジーニュースも。 ・ファッションやコスメ、恋愛や育児、グルメ、インテリアなどの女子向けニュースも。 ・芸能人や音楽アーティスト、映画やドラマ、海外ゴシップなどのエンタメニュースも。 ・プロ野球や海外サッカーなどのスポーツニュースも。 ・アニメやゲーム、サブカル、まとめ記事、おもしろネタも。 あなたの興味や趣味に自動で適応。新聞のような雑誌のようなキュレーション・アプリ、それがMyndです。 【サポートについて】 バグや不具合などの報告やお問い合わせは、 corp@mynd.jp までお気軽にご連絡ください。 ※Myndはあなたが読んだ記事をもとに推薦の精度が向上する仕組みになっています。また、TwitterやFacebookなどのアカウントと連携すると、推薦の精度が向上します。レコメンドの精度が低いと思われる場合は、是非お試し下さい。 【対応デバイス】 スマートフォン、タブレット、パソコン、メールとあらゆるデバイスで使うことができるユニバーサル・アプリです。 PC版: https://mynd.jp こんなワードでも検索されています。 Mynd, Mind, マインド, まいんど

description: Это полная версия игры "Грамотей!", в которой открыты и доступны все дополнения: более 1200 слов, уровни сложности и т.д.! Вы тоже не знали,что "из-под мышек" пишется именно так?Тогда «Грамотей!» - для Вас! Проверьте свои знания с игрой "Грамотей!", игрой для умных людей! В орфографической викторине собраны самые каверзные слова русского языка. Каждая игра состоит из 20 вопросов. Вам дается 4 варианта написания непростого слова. Задача состоит в том, чтобы выбрать один правильный ответ. В конце игры Вы узнаете, чего стоят Ваши знания: от 1 до 5+. В данной версии Вам доступно: - намного больше интересных и трудных слов - продвижение по уровням сложности - режим "Работа над ошибками" - уровень «Полиглот» - 4 в 1: орфография, ударение, род, значение Запоминайте правописание слов, ставьте рекорды и соревнуйтесь с другими игроками! Соберите все награды и бонусы и станьте лучшим! Повышение качества орфографии и расширение кругозора гарантированы! Создатели игры использовали авторитетные толковые и орфографические словари русского языка. Все слова, внесенные в игровой корпус, являются нормированными лексическими единицами русского языка. В составе приложения "Грамотей!" присутствует виджет: разместите виджет на рабочем столе, и на протяжении дня он будет демонстрировать Вам сложные слова. Добавить widget можно на рабочем столе устройства. Также в состав приложения входят живые обои "Грамотей!", на которых могут отображаться слова из приложения, сменяться фоновая картинка и проплывать пузырьки, которые можно лопать. Включить Live Wallpaper можно на рабочем столе в меню изменения фоновой картинки устройства. Грамотей! – Стань умней! «Грамотей!»© AllyTeam 2013. This is the full version of the game "Gramotey!", Which are open and accessible all the extras: more than 1200 words, difficulty levels, and so on! You also do not know what "out mice" is spelled that way? Then "Gramotey!" - For you! Test your knowledge of the game "Gramotey!" Game for smart people! In spelling quiz collected trickiest word of Russian. Each game consists of 20 questions. You are given 4 options of writing a difficult word. The challenge is to choose the correct answer. At the end of the game you will learn what are your knowledge: from 1 to 5+. In this version available to you: - A lot more interesting and difficult words - Promotion by level of complexity - Mode "Correction of mistakes" - The level of "Polyglot" - 4 in 1: spelling, accent, gender, value Memorize the spelling of words, put the records and compete with other players! Collect all rewards and bonuses and become the best! Improving the quality of spelling and broaden their horizons Guaranteed! The game creators have used authoritative monolingual dictionaries and spelling of the Russian language. All the words entered in the gaming case are normalized lexical units of the Russian language. As part of the application "Gramotey!" present widget: place the widget on the desktop, and during the day it will show you the difficult words. Add widget you can on your desktop device. Also, your application includes a live wallpaper "Gramotey!", Which can display words from the application replaced the background image and swim bubbles that can burst. Enable Live Wallpaper you can on the desktop menu, change the background picture of the device. Scientist! - Become a smarter! "Gramotey!» © AllyTeam 2013.

description: GYMG FITNESS is your personal pocket trainer!!! Our App offers you a big amount of info that will help you to reach your goals. GYMG Fitness has many exercises and workouts for training at your gym or at home. GYMG Fitness has the following sections: Exercises Guide - More than 100 different exercises to do at the gym with explanation of the exercise, info about involved muscles, animated images and an explanation video Workouts - Different workouts that will help you to schedule your weekly work, as hard as you want or you can Celebrity Workouts - Workouts used by celebrities This app is free, we only ask you for your positive rating so that more people knows the app and we can keep improving it We hope you like it!!

If you like Cluedo or Clue, we think you'll love this new game. CSI Sherlock is a whodunit game, where the victim, Vic, has been murdered in the Bates Hotel. The CSI team have finished their work, and the famous detective Sherlock Holmes has been called in to see who murdered Vic. A full picture has now been built up and they know who killed Vic, what weapon was used, and the location in or around the hotel in which the murder took place. The challenge for you, as Sherlock's assistant, is to work this out for yourself, based on clues that your mentor Sherlock has available to give to you. Sherlock gives you one clue, associated with Vic. You then have to ask Sherlock for additional clues associated with a given person, weapon or place. Each clue takes the form Person:Weapon:Place representing 3 relationships: Person is with Weapon; Person is in Place; and Weapon is in Place, together with a score saying how many of the 3 are true. You can focus in on certain people, weapons or places, by bringing all given clues associated with them to the top of the list. When you think you know the murderer, the murder weapon and the murder location, you can identify these in the Accused row, and check to see whether you are correct. You can get full explanations of how a particular conclusion could be reached with all available clues. Elementary? It depends on you and the level you play at. The higher the level, the more suspects and the deeper the reasoning required. And can you get the correct answer in the suggested time? Time is running out.

As a bonus the Ads will be removed and you will gain access to some additional nice to have but non-essential features. If you have a problem after purchasing the donate key, email me within 7 days and I will happily help you or refund the purchase provided you can supply your Google Play receipt. ServiiGo requires Serviio PRO v1.2 or greater (1.5 recommended) which you can download from http://www.serviio.org You will get a free 15 day evaluation license for Serviio PRO during which time you can evaluate Serviio PRO and ServiiGo. After that period you will need to purchase a Serviio PRO license as the API that ServiiGo uses is only available in the PRO edition of Serviio. It is therefore recommened that you wait until you have purchased a Serviio PRO license before buying this donate key.

Personal Mobile Radio (short: PMR) works like classic Walkie Talkie. You can speak to others in real time. However, it has an advantage over conventional WT - you can speak to one person or to many. Of course, it happens in real time and voice quality is very high - you can even listen to music on the distance. The application uses Wifi technology. You can connect to other devices by conventional router, Wifi Direct or mobile access point. A few examples how you can use this app: * outside work: a construction site, garden * baby monitor (you can use function to continuous transmission) * paintball game, hide-and-seek etc * outgoing Communication range depends on device and terrain. Approximate, tested ranges: - if you use separate Wifi AP: range up to 200 meters in free area - if you use Mobile Wifi AP, Wifi-Direct: range about 100 meters in free area Now download and install PMR, push to speak button, hold and speak to one or many friends. Political Digest brings you the latest and the most relevant political news, hand picked and curated by Memeorandum.com, the world's most popular political news aggregation service, that gives you multiple angles of the same story. For thousands of people, the day starts with Memeorandum.com. And now Political Digest makes sure your favorite political news site is available in its truest form on your phones and tablets, with added features such as notification, news widget and more. Even if you don't have time to go through the news, Political Digest has a radio function that will read out the news for you. Features: ★ Scalable design - for both phones and tablets (for 7" like the Nexus 7 in particular) ★ Top News section - that shows only the most relevant news ★ River section - featuring all news stories ★ History tab - that provides a searchable list of your reading history ★ Radio - reads news out for you and can be accessed outside the app with widget ★ Color change - for news titles to indicate a story that has been read (similar to link color in web browsers) ★ Notifications - for top news only ★ Widget - that displays all stories from River section ★ Control the notification, set the refresh rate, ringtone, vibration, LED light and more What differentiates Political Digest from other similar apps is that you get to read multiple angles of the same report, from different sources. In politics you can never get the complete picture by going through just one source. And that is where Political Digest comes in. For example if the same news appears at New York Times, Politico, Washington Post, CNN and BBC, Political Digest displays prominently only the first site that was to report that news, groups the rest of the sites into a collection and hides it from the main view. Alternate sources of the same news can be accessed by clicking the "Discussion" button. And when one or more news items are related, they are properly grouped like on the Memeorandum website. Author names (when available) are also properly mentioned just above the story title (like Alex Altman / Wall Street Journal, John Roberts / Reuters, Jason Smith / Associated Press), so that you can easily identify your favorite reporter's works. With Democratic Barack Obama - Joe Biden getting a second term in the White House, what could be the Republican agenda for Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan? What could be the world-wide impact of the public uproar in dictator led Asian regions? Download Political Digest today and have your daily dose of relevant political news, from multiple angles, in its most complete form. Permission Explained:- READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY permission is used to stop the radio when you receive an incoming call. Otherwise the radio will continue playing and you won't be able to hear your caller. Disclaimer:- Political Digest is in no way affiliated with Memeorandum.com. We love Memeorandum and wanted to provide the best user experience for the site, on phones and tablets. We do believe nothing can match the convenience of visiting Memeorandum.com directly when using a PC and would recommend you to do so. But when you are on the go, Political Digest will come in handy. All icon copyrights belong to the respective sites.

Apex/GO Launcher Theme Steampunk It is an Apex- and Go- Launcher Themes i.e. it will work on either or both launchers. The Theme includes five wallpapers, alarm clock and package of icons. Apex Launcher: - Install Apex Launcher. - Install Theme. - Tap on "Apex Settings". - Choose "Theme Settings". - Select the Theme and apply it. GO Launcher: - Install Go Launcher. - Install Theme. - Tap on "Themes" icon and choose "Installed" tab. - Select the Theme and apply. To change an icon: Long press on any application icon on your desktop. "Replace" menu will popup. Press on the "Theme's icon" and choose any icon you like for your application. To Change the Wallpaper: Find wallpaper chooser and select the Theme's wallpaper. Scroll among wallpapers, select desirable and press "Set wallpaper" button. To Open the Alarm Clock: Select "Widgets" and find the Theme's clock It is still very useful to watch youtube video about the Theme.

description: Hungry? Good. Because that’s what we’re here for. We offer free ordering for delivery or pickup from more than 28,000 restaurants in 600+ cities. Just search by address or current location, find what you’re hungry for, order and enjoy. So, that’s easy. Maybe too easy. We don’t know, but we hope so. #marketing Features: - Menus, reviews, restaurant information and free ordering from, actually, we already said this: over 28,000 restaurants nationwide. - Search by cuisine, menu item or specific restaurant and filter restaurants hours, reviews, coupons, etc. - Pay with cash, credit or PayPal. And if you’re into those last two, you can save your info so you don’t have to enter that stuff more than once. - Use your current location or enter an address to find nearby takeout spots. - Save your addresses to order even faster from the places you frequent. - Track your orders with our not-so-cleverly-named Track Your Grub feature. - Past orders are saved so you can reorder in a few taps. Pizza, pizza. - Coupons and discounts are always appreciated, so we have those. Did we already mention we’re in more than 600 cities? You know, like New York, Chicago, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Boston, Philadelphia, Washington DC, Pittsburgh, Baltimore, Hartford, Atlanta, Denver, Miami, Phoenix, Seattle and… however many more it takes to get to 600+.

********PLEASE READ********** This skin requires the latest UCCW application, this is not a standalone apk. You can get the UCCW app from here: http://goo.gl/1HxY2 Instructions: 1. Install the apk 2. Select to add a widget 3. Find UCCW Widgets 4. Select to add a 3x3 Widget 5. Select to add Battery Clock 6. Resize to your liking Troubleshooting: If for whatever reason the skin does not show up try these procedures. Rooted: 1. Open titanium backup and preform a back up on Battery Clock 2. Unistall Battery Clock via Titanium Backup 3. Then restore via TiBu, App Only 4. Then re-attempt the Instructions. Non-Rooted: Follow the same instructions as root users, except use the application Carbon to back up the application. If you need anymore help please send me an Email, I'll be more than happy to help you!

The AUA Guidelines Department produces Clinical Practice Guidelines and Best Practice Statements. The Department also facilitates AUA review and approval of guidelines developed by outside organizations as needed. In addition, The AUA Guidelines Department provides staff support for the Practice Guidelines Committee, a physician committee that serves as a resource to the Guidelines Department and guideline panels. Because of their clinical expertise, members of the Committee may advise other AUA departments as well.

description: 「Wi-Fiチェッカー」はあなたの周辺にあるWi-Fiスポットを素早く検索するアプリです。 　特に、外出中、動画やゲームを楽しんだり、大容量データをダウンロードしたい時など、高速にインターネット接続したい時にお役にたちます。 【主な特長】 　○アプリを開くだけで近くのWi-Fiスポットを素早く検索！ 　○地図やリストからお店をタップすると詳細情報を表示！ 　○お店のジャンルで絞り込み検索可能！ 　○O2Oサービス機能（ちかくのWi-Fiスポットをご紹介します） 　※O2Oサービスについてのより詳しい情報および各端末での操作・設定方法については、アプリ内ヘルプのFAQをご覧ください。 【掲載情報】 ○ソフトバンクWi-Fiスポット 　事業者：ソフトバンクモバイル株式会社 ○ＢＢモバイルポイント 　事業者：ソフトバンクテレコム株式会社 ○docomo Wi-Fi 　事業者：株式会社エヌ・ティ・ティ・ドコモ ○au Wi-Fi SPOT 　事業者：KDDI株式会社 ○FREESPOT 事業者：FREESPOT協議会 　＊本アプリに掲載の情報は、各サービス提供者の公開情報をもとに弊社独自の調査を行いご提供しておりますが、本アプリは各サービスの公式アプリではございません。 【レビュー記事のご紹介】 ─レビュー記事のご紹介──────────────── 　2012.11.09　mobileASCII 　Wi-Fiスポットを素早くチェック 　 http://mobileascii.jp/elem/000/000/052/52439/ 　2012.10.02　ミートロイド 　もう通信不良とはおさらば！Wi-Fiスポットをラクラク検索！ 　 http://www.meetroid.com/?p=149735 　2012.10.16 08:40　TABROID 　こりゃ便利！ 近くのWi-Fiスポットを教えてくれる『Wi-Fiチェッカー』 　 http://www.tabroid.jp/app/tools/2012/10/jp.co.agoop.wifichecker.html 　2012.10.16　オクトバ description: Nomnom cat is back! But this time around, with numbers. In Nomnom Numbers, you have to solve math problems like multiples, factors, equality, and divison in order to be rewarded with yummy sushi. But don't get it wrong, otherwise you might get a bomb! Compare your score and rank with the rest of the world to see how good your math skills are!

Niederländisch Wortschatz für unterwegs von PONS Sie möchten Niederländisch lernen, aber Ihnen fehlen die Worte? Mit dieser App können Sie kostenlos den wichtigsten Wortschatz lernen bzw. nachschlagen. Üben Sie wann und wo Sie wollen mit dem bewährten Lernkarteikarten-Prinzip. Einfaches Prinzip - große Wirkung Niederländisch Wortschatz für unterwegs bietet Ihnen die 1000 wichtigsten Wörter – mit Sprachausgabe für alle niederländischen Einträge. In 25 Kategorien können Sie den wichtigsten Wortschatz der relevanten Themen zu Reise und Alltag lernen und üben. Mit den virtuellen Lernkarten können Sie die Vokabeln Schritt für Schritt lernen. Wenn Sie das Wort kennen, wandert die Karte in das nächste Fach. Wenn Ihnen das Wort unbekannt war, bleibt die Karte im ersten Fach oder wandert dorthin zurück und wird so oft wiederholt, bis Sie das Wort kennen. Übersichtliche Statistiken informieren Sie über Ihren Lernfortschritt. Für wen ist die App besonders geeignet? Die App ist besonders geeignet für alle, die ihren Wortschatz erweitern oder auffrischen wollen. Die Themen: ● Begrüßung/Verabschiedung ● Zur eigenen Person ● Kennenlernen ● Beruf und Studium ● Familie und Freunde ● Datum und Uhrzeit ● Freizeit ● Festliche Anlässe ● Transportmittel ● Stadtbesichtigung ● Ferien ● Im Hotel ● Essen und Trinken ● Beim Einkauf ● Im Restaurant ● In der Küche ● Im Kaufhaus ● In der Natur ● Am Telefon ● Die Medien ● Körper und Körperpflege ● Gesundheit ● Wohnen ● Kunst und Kultur ● Berufsleben -------------------- Diese Applikation funktioniert 100 % offline. Es fallen für Sie keine Roaming-Gebühren an. Auf welchen Geräten läuft die App? Android 1.6 oder höher. Benutzersprache: Deutsch Zielsprache: Niederländisch -------------------- Diese App wurde von PONS und der Mobilinga GmbH gemeinsam entwickelt. PONS steht für hohe Qualität der Lerninhalte und jahrelange Erfahrung in der Erstellung von Sprachlernprodukten, die Mobilinga GmbH für innovative und benutzerfreundliche mobile Applikationen. Über PONS Seit über 30 Jahren entwickelt PONS grüne Sprachlernmaterialien fürs Leben: vom klassischen Wörterbuch und der Grammatik über Audio- und Software-Sprachkurse bis hin zu kostenlosen Online-Angeboten wie dem Sprachenportal www.pons.eu. Mehr PONS Produkte: www.pons.de Außerdem: www.twitter.com/pons_eu sowie www.facebook.com/PONSverlag Über Mobilinga Die Mobilinga GmbH aus Bremen ist der Spezialist für die Konzeption und Entwicklung von mobilen Applikationen. Dabei kooperiert die Mobilinga GmbH sowohl mit Großkonzernen wie auch mit mittelständischen Unternehmen. So bietet Mobilinga z.B. zusammen mit Gruner+Jahr das GEO-Magazin auf dem iPad an. Daneben sind eine Vielzahl von Mobilinga-Lernapplikationen im Appstore verfügbar. Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter www.mobilinga.de. Dutch vocabulary on the go by PONS You want to learn Dutch, but you lack the words? With this app you can get for free the most important vocabulary and look up. Practice when and where you want with the proven record sheet principle learning. Simple principle - great effect Dutch vocabulary on the go offers you the most important words 1000 - with voice output for all Dutch entries. In 25 categories You can learn and practice the key vocabulary of the relevant topics of travel and everyday life. With virtual flashcards you can learn your vocabulary step by step. If you know the word, the card goes into the next compartment. If you had the word unknown, the card remains in the first compartment or wanders back there and is repeated until you know the word. Clear statistics inform you of your progress. For whom the app is especially useful for? The app is especially suitable for those who want to expand or refresh their vocabulary. Topics:  ● Welcome note / adoption  ● For your own person  ● Meet  ● work and study  ● Family and Friends  ● Date and time  ● Leisure  ● Festive Occasions  ● Transport  ● Sightseeing  ● Holiday  ● In Hotel  ● Eating and Drinking  ● When Shopping  ● In the restaurant  ● In the kitchen  ● A store  ● In the Nature  ● On the phone  ● The media  ● Body and Body Care  ● Health  ● Living  ● Arts and Culture  ● professional life -------------------- This application provides 100% offline. There are no roaming charges for you. What devices running the app? Android 1.6 or higher. User Language: German Target language: Dutch -------------------- This app was developed by PONS GmbH and the Mobilinga. Perseus stands for high-quality learning content and years of experience in the creation of language learning products. Mobilinga GmbH for innovative and user-friendly mobile applications About PONS For over 30 years PONS develops green materials for learning languages ​​for life: from classic dictionaries and grammar aids to audio and software language courses to free online services such as the voice portal www.pons.eu. More products PONS: www.pons.de Also: www.twitter.com / pons_eu and www.facebook.com / PONSverlag About Mobilinga The Mobilinga GmbH of Bremen is the specialist in the design and development of mobile applications. The Mobilinga GmbH cooperates with both large corporations as well as medium-sized companies. So Mobilinga offers e.g. together with Gruner + Jahr, the GEO magazine on the iPad. In addition, a variety of Mobilinga-learning applications are available in the AppStore. For more information, see www.mobilinga.de.

description: This game is the Android game for the Web Game Site "DAN-BALL". Control the panda with bright beam on its eyes, and light the park. How bright can you make it within the time limit? It's a panda's 3D action game! The panda moves toward the touched direction. The panda turns all the objects into a lamp with its eye beam. You have 99 seconds! Light as many objects as you can. Total score is decided depending on the lighting object and the jumping height. When you acquire constant Total score, the star is appended to the stage icon. Please do your best to aim to get three stars. Please Enjoy it!

description: SimpleSalat focuses on providing accurate prayer times and precise Qiblah direction readings for Muslims. SimpleSalat calculates prayers times and will notify the user when it is time to pray! SimpleSalat calculates prayer times based on current location and will automatically recalculate times when location significantly changes. If prayer times are slightly off, please adjust calculation method under Settings. Note that SimpleSalat uses YOUR specific coordinates to calculate prayer times, so it may be more accurate. Features: -Simple interface. Ice Cream Sandwich theme! -Lightweight. SimpleSalat is VERY tiny in size. -Prayer time calculator. Accurately calculates all five prayer times and alerts the user when it is time to pray! -Qiblah finder. Precise and responsive compass points you in the right direction! Adjusts for True Magnetic North to ensure accuracy. -Display and adjust Hijri date -Adjust Prayer times to match local masjid times -Automatic location detection. Perfect if you travel! SimpleSalat will detect the new location and automatically calculate prayer times for the new locale. -Prayer Time table widgets. Two widgets allow you to see prayer timings right on your home screen. -Supports 6 different calculation methods -Supports Shafi and Hanafi madhabs -Supports playing Adhan at the time of prayer -Set notification preferences for each prayer -Set reminder for each prayer -Display reminders for important Islamic dates
release_text: Added a new 4x1 widget Added time offsets for prayers Reorganized settings menu for easier navigation Added a link to SimpleSalat+ Major bug fixes - Reverted original widget back to 2x2 - Fixed inconsistent notification noises - Increased compass accuracy - Major battery life improvements - Fixed adhan so it does not play if phone is on vibrate

description: This is a memory card game called Memory game contest. The main purpose of the game is to discover all pairs in the grid. The game is good for children for training cognitive and memory skills, but adults may find it interesting as well. There are two game modes: Classic and Time challenge. To win the classic mode you have to find all the pairs of cards in as little moves as possible. If more players finish with the same quantity of moves, the winner is the player that finishes the game fastest. In Time challenge mode the number of moves is not important. The only things that matters is time, which is measured to one milisecond accurate. Whoever finds all pairs fastest wins the game. You can check how well you did on the Online scoreboard, where you can find the results of all players that ever played the game and uploaded their results. Have fun playing Memory contest!

If you have ever wanted to be a sniper then Sniper Training 3D is certainly for your. Pick up your gun and get shooting in 14 epic training zones. Each with a different challenge to test your shooting skills. Stunning true 3D graphics with slow mo on good shots make this a truly stunning game. Each level brings a truly unique flavor. Everything from moving targets to aim your gun at to huge towers full of them. Some missing with timers and others with score counts needed to proceed. Features: - Stunning 3D graphics engine to give you the best experience possible. - 14 action packed levels to keep you playing for weeks. - A variety of targets to hit from moving to static and hidden between other objects.

description: FlashRX is a flashcard and quiz-based educational tool for healthcare students and professionals to learn the top 200 medications in the outpatient setting (Top 200 Drugs). Instead of complicated drug cards, FlashRX’s drug database focuses on simple, usable information to develop your core knowledge base. ** THIS IS A LITE VERSION ** In this lite version, a list of 50 drugs (selected at random) are included in the drug database. The paid version of this app contains a full database of 200 drugs. ** THIS IS A LITE VERSION ** The emphasis on concise, practical knowledge will improve learning and comprehension of the top 200 drugs. This is a learning tool – NOT a drug reference. This app is not a comprehensive resource for drug information. This app is perfect for pharmacists, pharmacy technicians, physician assistants, nurses, nursing students, physicians, medical students, and other healthcare professionals. The drug database is designed to aid in studying for both students in school and those preparing for standardized exams (eg, NAPLEX, BCPS, PTCB, ExCPT, PANCE/PANRE, NCLEX, USMLE, COMLEX). == FEATURES == • Beautiful, intuitive flashcard and quiz modes to optimize your learning strategy • Flashcards and quiz content are fully customizable – test yourself on brand/generic names, drug classes, indications, adverse effects, and even typical dose ranges • Quiz mode includes a selection algorithm to randomly identify intelligent distractor answers to keep you on your toes • An adaptive (Leitner) learning mode so that your time is focused on drug cards that you haven’t yet mastered == DRUG DATABASE == • Includes information on 200 of the most common outpatient medications based on net sales, total prescriptions, and unique or emerging therapeutic classes • Each drug entry includes its brand name, generic name, generic pronunciation (phonetic spelling and actual recorded audio), drug class, indications, adverse effects, and typical dosing • The drug database is completely customizable – add or remove drugs, change drug entries, and even record your own pronunciation == ADAPTIVE LEARNING STATISTICS == • Both flashcard and quiz modes utilize an adaptive learning algorithm to keep track of which drug facts you know well, and which need more review • Track your learning progress by viewing your statistics at the end of each flashcard or quiz session, or access the dedicated Adaptive Learning Statistics page for your learning overview == AUTHOR INFORMATION == This app and all of its content was created by Sean P. Kane, PharmD, BCPS – a clinical pharmacist, assistant professor, and author of the popular evidence-based website, ClinCalc.com.

From pilgrims to popcorn, A Charlie Brown Thanksgiving comes to life in this beautifully re-mastered 40th anniversary edition. Magically marrying a book-like feel with clever interactive elements, A Charlie Brown Thanksgiving will leave your senses hungry for a second helping! Kick the football with Charlie Brown, prepare the meal with Master Chef Snoopy, and set the table with Woodstock as the gang discovers the true meaning of Thanksgiving. A Charlie Brown Thanksgiving captures the playful nature of this timeless TV classic through hundreds of living animations, illustrations and graphic elements. Make a new family tradition this holiday season – add A Charlie Brown Thanksgiving to your digital library today! App Features: • Featuring dialogue, music and sound effects from the original 1973 animated special. • All-new art style turns every page into a living illustration • Touch, tilt and slide your way through every page of the book! • Leaf collecting feature and instructional elements playfully guide little readers through the story. • “For Parents” area safely separates adult controls from child-friendly content. • Enhanced type and improved swipe tabs increase the applications readability across devices. • Engaging narration by Stephen Shea, the voice of Linus van Pelt. • Three reading modes are included for your enjoyment: Read to Me, Read Myself, and Autoplay. • Additional educational features include word highlighting and touch-to-speak technology.

description: Haiku is one of the most important form of traditional japanese poetry. Largely through the efforts of Masaoka Shiki, this independence was formally established in the 1890s through the creation of the term haiku. This new form of poetry was to be written, read and understood as an independent poem, complete in itself, rather than part of a longer chain. The history of the modern haiku dates from Masaoka Shiki's reform, begun in 1892, which established haiku as a new independent poetic form. Shiki's reform did not change two traditional elements of haiku: the division of 17 syllables into three groups of 5, 7, and 5 syllables and the inclusion of a seasonal theme. NOTE: NO ADS, NO CONNECTION REQUIRED (this App runs in standard mode, better if visualization is on smartphone)

Вы также можете добавить понравившийся статус в избранное, скопировать, отправить смс, на вконтакте, одноклассники или другие приложения установленные на Вашем телефоне. Вы также можете выбирать статусы из категорий: - Красивые статусы (691) - про жизнь (429) - про любовь (218) - Прикольные статусы (216) - про девушек (34) - Грустные статусы (105) - Веселые (33) - про друзей (48) - про счастье (43) - про маму (36) - Смешные (11) - про детей (17) Надеюсь несложный и приятный интерфейс позволит вам насладиться содержимым. You can also choose the status of the categories:   - Beautiful statuses (691)   - Pro-life (429)   - About love (218)   - Funny statuses (216)   - About the girls (34)   - Sad statuses (105)   - Funny (33)   - About friends (48)   - About happiness (43)   - About my mother (36)   - Funny (11)   - About the children (17) Hopefully a simple and user-friendly interface allows you to enjoy the content.

by Tin Man Games Insane fun for Kids & Adults alike as you grow and harvest Froot from your own personal Frootree. Pluck feisty Plum, confused Pear, cool Orange and anxious Apple from their branches as they yawn and giggle their way to life and collect them in your Frootbaskets. Frootrees is great for beginners, but to reap the ultimate harvesting rewards, risks must be taken and Froot-picking skills matured. To score points players must pluck Froot before they wither and fall to the ground. Picking Froot at their ripest means maximum points will be achieved. A number of well-timed plucks in a row will lead to multipliers, and fighting gravity will give extra bonus points too. The cute Froots will keep you entertained as they blossom, and they will continue to grow so you can continue to harvest. Challenge friends and family in this classic arcade-style Froot-picking extravaganza. Please email us with questions or feedback. Try our other awesome HD & 3D Games. Whether you want a puzzle, arcade, action, strategy or casual game, we've something entertaining for you: * In TileStorm highly addictive puzzles of path construction against the clock are great brain training as you guide Eggbot the Robot through a jungle of challenges. Pocket gold coins in TileStorm Eire as you need to slide the tiles to guide our robo hero from spire to castle on an Irish adventure in another beautiful brain teaser. Or bag a jewel or two in TileStorm Polar in a super new Tile Storm story. Free Lite version [Massive Hadron] * Fight for survival over a night in the city with a gun & torch as your only defense (defence) against an angry zombie hoard in Aftermath XHD. Attack or run? It's your choice. [Two Heads] * Glide through the air like a paper plane (or the birds!) as you race flying at high speed from tower to tower in Ground Effect Pro X HD. Enjoy virtual physics, acceleromoter control and stereoscopic 3D. [Glenn Corpes] * Be truly challenged by Denki Blocks! Deluxe which The Sunday Times called “a Tetris for the 21st century" * Slice, dice, cut, chop, pop and flick blobs of color goo in Mixt. Includes bonus MP3 music track by DJ Shur-i-kan to enjoy as you mix the bubbles of coloured paint [Uprising] * Fun for kids and all the family alike. Farm freaky fruit in Frootrees Halloween Edition as you flick, throw and toss the Froot to harvest them using your poker skills to balance risk & reward. Just a hint of south park. [Tin Man] * Be a cool snowboard ninja and smash the course record in Snow Dude. Don't tank your jump! [Lycette Bros] * A retro glow awaits you in Spirit - carve space with your touch * Shave face like never before in Magnetic Shaving Derby [Brandon Williamson] * For sports fans, check out Big Cup Cricket and Big Hit Baseball FREE from our friends at Beautiful Game Studios. Small Print: VAT added if bought within EU. Game may require license from Google and collect anonymous stats for quality purposes. If u get error "Unknown reason -18", please email us or google for solution. Dev tested on devices from HTC, Samsung, Motorola, Sony Ericsson incl Xperia Play, Droid, Galaxy & Desire Z.

This free calculator is able to convert the temperature from fahrenheit to celsius, and from celsius to fahrenheit. The best app for school, college and work! If you are a student, it will helps you to learn temperature calculations. Note: On the Fahrenheit scale, the freezing point of water is 32 degrees Fahrenheit (°F) and the boiling point 212 °F (at standard atmospheric pressure). On the Celsius scale, the freezing point of water is 0 *C and the boiling point 100 °C.

Poindexter, a pint-sized scientist, has grown bored with his library of stories. He wants to make his stories more interesting and that's where you come in! You will need to feed Poindexter's super computer a series of words so that she can insert them in a story to generate something new and exciting. That's right, his computer is a "she". Stories: Read existing stories or ad lib and write new stories of your own. This app contains original stories, fairy tales, nursery rhymes, and even the popular MASH game. Many stories adapted from classical works have new twists and have been rewritten as madlibs. Here are some of the stories available in the app: Note: any story marked with (*) is not available in the free version - The Three Little Pigs - Little Red Riding Hood* - Cinderella* - The Ugly Duckling - M.A.S.H. - Mega M.A.S.H.* - Hansel & Gretel* - The Tortoise and the Hare - Jack and the Beanstalk* - Goldilocks and the Three Bears* - Rumplestiltskin - Hey Diddle Diddle - The Revolting Blob - The Frog Prince - The Lion and the Mouse - There was a Crooked Man - Little Miss Muffet Target Audience & Education: This game can be enjoyed by anyone. It has been made suitable for younger children but, older crowds will still appreciate the humour thrown in and should not hesitate to try this out. This app may be suitable for kids as an educational tool to help them learn about English words, nouns, verbs, adjectives, adverbs, grammar, and sentence structure. Stories are reviewed and edited by English and Education professionals in Canada. Content & Updates: Stories written by the app Developer are mainly shortened versions of classic fairy tales that have been adapted to work with this app so, they are a different take on these stories and sometimes even have new twists. This app works offline, too! You will want to be connected to a network the first time you load this up to get initial content so, go ahead and open it as soon as it finishes installing. The libs (library of stories) will continue to update in the future whenever you open this app with a network connection. Disclaimer: When a story is created in the app or is shared and leaves the domain of the app, it is no longer property of the app Developer and becomes the property or creation of the user. The author of Stories Gone Mad is not responsible for words used (or combinations of words) that can be made offensive to someone. *requires full version

description: SAVE THE POPSTAR, SAVE THE WORLD! Help Toshi dance to defeat the evil demons. Save Toshi (for iOS) reached the #7 Top Paid iPhone Puzzle Game in the US and was featured on iTunes under Best Puzzle Games. Over 1 million people have already saved Toshi, giving the game an average rating of 4.5 (out of 5)! This free android version comes with 1 free level pack (20 levels). 4 additional packs can be unlocked for free by using the awesome built in Tapjoy’s offer-wall. PRESS QUOTES (iOS VERSION): “It’s a lovely mix of cute and challenging at a price too good to pass up” Kotaku “2D physics puzzlers like Angry Birds and Cut the Rope dominated the sales charts in 2010, we’re already looking for what’s next, and we think we’ve found it!” SlideToPlay “There is only one flaw to this game, and that is that at some point the game ends.” TouchGen “In short…get this game…play this game…it’s super good!” IPwnGames A NEW DIMENSION TO PUZZLE SOLVING Physics puzzles are definitely one of the most popular game genres on mobile. While most of these puzzles take place in simple 2d worlds, Save Toshi pulls ahead of the competition by providing a unique 3D take on the genre. ME LOVE TO DANCING! Every time mega popstar Toshi dances... a demon dies! This is why the evil demons kidnapped Toshi and made her forget how to walk. Without her supernatural dancing powers the world is in danger! Your mission is to help Toshi get to the dance-floor area by shooting and smashing down the different types of blocks she is standing on. SUPER SIMPLE The intuitive controls that are incredibly simple to pick up. To shoot, tap your finger on the target. To rotate your view, just drag your finger around. Save Toshi has an easy and straightforward learning process with detailed in-game tutorials and there is also a hint system to help players with even with the most challenging levels. SUPER CHALLENGING! The level design uses a wide variety of game-play elements (different materials, explosives, hinges, and more) to create 100 mind-boggling physics puzzles. To get the best score you will need to solve all levels with as few shots as possible. And while the game starts out with extremely easy tutorial puzzles, later levels will really challenge you to think in all 3 dimensions! FEATURE LIST: * Amazingly fluid and realistic 3d physics * 100 fun and challenging levels with a smooth difficulty curve * Outstanding variety of different game-play elements * Intuitive and super easy to pick up controls * Easy and straightforward learning process with in-game tutorials * Hint system available for all levels * Simple stars scoring system (based on number of shots) * Unlock levels for free using Tapjoy’s offerwall * Cute and hilarious lead anime character * HD quality 3D graphics * Unlock new outfits, music & environments We believe in an ongoing conversation with our players, so please let us know what you think about Save Toshi! follow us on facebook or subscribe to our mailing list on our website to get FREE bonus content alerts in the future. -------------------------------------------------------- Website: http://www.nitako.com Twitter: http://twitter.com/nitako Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/user/noamabta Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/home.php?#/profile.php?id=698460871&ref=profile iTunes

description: Link2SD is an application manager that makes it easy for Android 2.0+ users on their device to move applications to the SD card. It enables you to manage your apps and storage easily. Features: ✔ Link apk, dex and lib files of apps to SD card ✔ Link internal data of apps to SD card (Plus) ✔ Link external data and obb folders of apps and games to SD card (Plus) ✔ Link dex files of the system apps to SD card (Plus) ✔ Auto clear cache service (Plus) ✔ Automatically link newly installed apps (optional) ✔ Move any user apps to SD even though the app does not support moving to SD ("force move") ✔ Shows the apps that support moving to SD with native app2sd ✔ Set the default install location of the apps; auto, internal, or external ✔ Batch link, unlink, reinstall, uninstall, "move to SD", "move to phone" functions ✔ Notify when movable apps installed ✔ Uninstall system applications (bloatware removal) ✔ Freeze and un-freeze system and users applications ✔ Convert system apps into user apps ✔ Convert user apps into system apps ✔ Integrate "Updated" system apps into system (ROM) ✔ Clear data and cache of the application ✔ Batch clear data and cache of the selected apps ✔ Clear all apps cache at once (1-tap cache cleaner without being root) ✔ Exclusion list for "Clear all app cache" function ✔ Clear cache widget (1-tap cache cleaner without being root) ✔ Notify if total cache size exceeds specified size ✔ Reboot manager includes power off, normal reboot, quick (hot) reboot, reboot recovery, reboot bootloader / download mode ✔ Reboot widget to boot with one click ✔ List applications, show detailed size information and link status ✔ Wide variety of options to sort and filter apps ✔ Search applications by name ✔ Display available space information of internal storage, SD card and SD card 2nd partition ✔ Share the Play Store link or the APK (app's full package) file of the apps ✔ Create shortcut for the apps ✔ Support 40+ languages How it works: Linking apps Link2SD uses a secondary partition on your SD card and uses it as another segment of internal storage. Link2SD moves apk, dalvik-cache (.dex), lib and internal data files into this partition, which the OS mounts on boot, and creates a symbolic link in the original location. This retains the file structure that the system expects but with the bulk of the data moved to the SD card. Linking obb and external data folders of apps and games On devices that have emulated SD card, obb and external data folders are located in the internal storage, not in the external (real) SD card. Link2SD moves these folders to the 1st or the 2nd partition of your external SD card (depending on your selection) and with the bind option of the mount command remounts the file hierarchy at external SD card while it is still available at the original location. What you need: Linking apps - root permission - second partition on SD card You should have two partitions on your SD card and both should be primary. You need to use a non-FAT file system (ext2, ext3, ext4 or f2fs) on your 2nd partition in order to link app's private data files. Because the FAT file system (FAT16, FAT32 or exFAT) does not support UNIX file ownership or permissions and will cause a security breakdown of app's private files. Link2SD does not create the second partition, you need to create it yourself. Linking obb and external data folders of apps and games - root permission Second partition on SD card is optional, folders can be moved to the 1st or 2nd second partition of the SD card. Link2SD also provides native App2SD feature of Android OS. It can move any user apps to SD card (force move), with batch moving capability. Link2SD is a free (ad supported) app, you can upgrade to Link2SD Plus to remove ads and get additional features. DISCLAIMER: It is made available for use at your own risk with no warranty of any kind.
release_text: The long awaited feature to link external data and obb folders of apps and games is now available. 4.0.12 - added 64bit support - minor bug fixes and improvements

aWARemote for Winamp® Simply the most beautiful and extensive Winamp® remote control for Android. Take control over the Winamp® media player on your PC - with your Android Smartphone. Control the current playback, manage the current playlist and access your media library. aWARemote for Winamp® offers all this, and more. Awards: telefon.de - "Cool App" Try it now! These are the features that aWARemote for Winamp® offers: - Control over current playback - Manage and save current playlist - Access Winamp's queue function - Access the Winamp media library and your saved playlists (limited to 1000 songs and 5 playlists in free version) - Search the Winamp media library - turn visualizations on and off - Equalizer - Light and dark theme - Modern Holo UI and easy handling - Comprehensive options - Start Winamp from your smartphone - 2 widgets - Support for creating multiple profiles for different computers - Wake on LAN directly in the app - Sleep timer - File browser [aWARemote Pro only] - Password-protected and AES secured Client-Server connection (optional) 200.000 users and a 4,7/5 stars rating for aWARemote Pro for Winamp® speak for themselves. description: Which country does the capital city 'Paris' belong to? If you chose 'France'. You are right. Capital to Country Quiz tells you the city, and you have to guess the country. Its the best way to memorize capital cities of the world. ★ Learn about the world while you play. ★ Complete offline play. No need for internet to play. ★ Use hints like map, flag, neighbour countries or other cities to find the right answer. ★ Play at your own pace, no locked levels. No game overs. ★ Use hints to research. Get free daily coins for hints. ★ Coins cannot be bought with money. You must answer correctly to earn coins or wait for the daily free coins. ★ Locks a question for an hour if answered wrong to prevent brute force attempts to answer that question. ★ Great to enforce learning by researching first rather than wild guessing. Test and improve your capital cities knowledge with this trivia game. This educational game will keep you busy during little break times. 240 capital cities need you to find their countries. Train your geography knowledge with this app. Are you ready for this useful game? Questions are in multiple choice format. Select the right answer to get extra coins. No typing involved. Get hints like map of the country, name of the neighbour countries, name of other major cities, the continent the country is in.

Opus #1 Free uses samples from a real church organ (coming from http://www.jeuxdorgues.com ) for a great realistic sound. You can download demo recordings and a trial version from http://www.refined-apps.com/opus-1 We also offer other music apps, including a version of the full Stiehr Mockers organ (the "Ultimate" version) with Midi/USB. For details, see refined-apps.com. If you have questions, remarks or suggestions, mail us at support@refined-apps.com . -- Highlights ---------- ✓ Low latency audio Low latency audio is a weak spot of Android (see http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=3434 ). Opus #1 provides lowest possible latency on your device. ✓ High quality samples for all contained stops -- Features -------- ✓ Support for lowest latency possible on your android device. ✓ 9 different organ ranks sampled from a real church organ (coming from Joseph Basquin / http://www.jeuxdorgues.com ) ✓ 4 predefined combinations ✓ Various reverb settings (no reverb, small church, medium church, cathedral, ...) ✓ The ranks can be played together like on a real organ; up to 512 pipes simultaneously ✓ 4 1/2 octave keyboard range just like the original organ ✓ Multitouch only limited by your device ✓ Scrollable on-screen keyboard ✓ Settings for the number of displayed keys, optional vibrate on touch, ... ✓ Runs on android >= 4.0.3, phones and tablets -- Usage Tips / Hardware requirements -------- ✓ Needs ca. 9.5 MB for the organ samples ✓ Use headphones / external speakers for better sound; phones speakers are not made for organs ✓ For the best sound, the device should have at least a 1GHz single core processor ---- Free vs. Pro vs. Ultimate ------------ Opus #1 Pro provides all the features of the Free version plus: ✓ Audio recording feature & sharing of recordings ✓ 15 stops instead of 9 ✓ Manual + pedal ✓ Registration view ✓ Midi via USB ✓ Midi player ✓ No ads Opus #1 Ultimate provides all the features of the Pro version plus: ✓ 21 stops (the full organ) instead of 15 ✓ 2 manuals + pedal ✓ 5 combinations -- Permissions -------- android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE to extract the sound samples onto the sdcard android.permission.VIBRATE for vibrate on touch support android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS for better audio support (OpenSL) android.permission.INTERNET and android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE to load ads

description: The world's most devilishly addictive defense game is back - welcome to Kingdom Rush: Frontiers! Bigger and badder than ever before, Kingdom Rush: Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made the original title an award-winning hit. Tap your troops through an epic (mis)adventure as you defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy new towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your foes to a pulp. (Don't worry, we've still got all the good ol' stuff from the last game, too. It's vintage now.) Kingdom Rush: Frontiers packs in so much content, it's like a fully upgraded artillery blast of mouthwatering, pixelated joy launched right into your smiling little face... and it hurts so good! GAME FEATURES • Fantastic Tower Defense game with lots of strategic decisions. Great power-user stuff like Reinforcements, Meteor Strikes, Freeze Bombs and medieval devastating nukes! • Fortify the frontier in exotic news lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles and even the underworld! • Eight new specialized tower upgrades! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up. • Over 18 tower abilities! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or Assassins that steal and kill your enemies! • Over 40 enemies with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes and underground terrors. • Eleven legendary heroes. Choose your champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles! • Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon! • Merciless boss fights! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades... • Upgrade system allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy. • Hours of gameplay with over 70 achievements! • Classic, Iron, and Heroic game modes to challenge your tactical skills! • Three difficulty modes! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode! Intoxicating charm with a rousing score, full-bodied voice-overs and lovingly illustrated cartoon art! (Complete with cartoon blood, naturally.) • In-game encyclopedia! True warriors know thine enemies... and their towers. Study up! PRAISE FOR KINGDOM RUSH: IGN Editor's Choice, Slide To Play Must Have, 148 Apps Editor's Choice, Jay is Games Game of the Year, Pocket Gamer Gold Award, Touch Arcade 4.5/5 Halloween Update - 3 new Halloween stages! - 9 new enemies! Face vicious Ghouls, Ghosts of lost souls, ferocious Werewolves and even powerful Vampires! - 2 New Heroes: Hire Dante the vampire slayer or summon Bonehart the legendary Dracolich. - New mechanic: Moonlight! - 5 achievements! - Easter Eggs and Cameos! Even the Headless Horseman!

Practice division sums with the Everlasting Maths Worksheet. Choose from 3 levels of division sums from basic to three figure problems but does not deal with decimal long division. It does however include problems where there is a remainder. Each sum is randomly produced one at a time on a blackboard style interface. Audio and visual encouragement let's you know when you are right and when you need to try again. Personalised certificates encourage improvement. Can be played landscape on a phone but best played on a tablet. This App is intended as an encouraging alternative to the rather mundane printed worksheets that students often have to complete to practise division sums. Suitable for UK Key Stage 2, 3, 4 & 5 - USA 2nd to 12th Grade (Age 7 - adult) Grey Olltwit Educational Programs: - Simple design makes them suitable for all, including Special Needs students e.g. ADHD, Autism, ASD etc. - Suitable for all ages. No furry animals or pre-school graphics - Certificates and/or High Score Tables reward good effort - Made in England by an Englishman No adverts. No in-app purchases.

description: *밤새 내 옆에 두고 싶은, 귀요미 펫들과 함께하는 퍼즐 * ♥ 30마리가 넘는 귀요미 펫들과 함께 해요 ♥ 팬더부터 토끼, 호랑이까지 다 내 것으로 만들자! 귀요미 펫들과 함께라면 콤보가 펑펑! 점수가 쑥쑥! ♥ 같은 블록 3개를 이으면 OK! ♥ 미련한 곰돌이도 할 수 있는 참 쉬운 퍼즐이~냥! 시간 제한 없이 느긋~하게! 고득점을 향해 Go~Go~ ♥ 특수블록과 찬스활용이면 고수 등극 ♥ 쉽다고 무시하면 큰 코 다친다~냥! 다양한 특수블록 조합과 찬스를 통해 콤보가 펑펑! 찬스 시에는 이동 횟수가 소모되지 않는다~냥! 그래서~! 찬스 활용이 킹왕짱 중요! 찬스가 발동되면 방울블록 등 특수 블록을 최대한 많이 만들어서 끊임없~~이 찬스가 이어질 수 있도록 방울 블록과 특수 블록을 조합! 조합! 또 조합!! ♥ 혼자서 하는 퍼즐은 이제 그만 ♥ 밴드 친구들과 함께 하는 밴드 미션! 많이 모이면 모일수록 달성은 껌이다~냥! 어제의 동지가 오늘의 적! 밴드 친구들의 점수를 하나 하나 이겨 나가는 쾌감! ♥ 내 기록을 달성할 때마다 행성돌파! 로켓을 타고 슝~ ♥ 별자리를 돌파할 때마다 루비와 금화가 와르르르! 한번 돌파한 별자리에서는 시간만 지나도 자동으로 보상이 생겨난다~냥! ♥ 고수 냥이들을 위한 주간 퍼즐 ♥ 매주 업데이트되는 주간 퍼즐을 놓치면 앙대~ 이 정도 퍼즐은 클리어해야 고수 소리좀 듣는다~냥!! ※ 유료 콘텐츠(아이템) 구매 시 별도의 요금이 부과됩니다. ● 청약 철회 및 구매 대금의 환불 등 - 이용자가 구매한 유료콘텐츠의 경우에는 계약 체결일 또는 유료콘텐츠 이용가능일로부터 7일 이내에 별도의 수수료 없이 청약철회(구매취소)를 할 수 있습니다. 단, 선물 및 이벤트 등 회사나 제3자로부터 무상으로 제공받은 유료콘텐츠, 청약철회 요청 당시 이미 사용하였거나 사용한 것으로 간주되는 유료콘텐츠 등 이에 준하는 특성을 가진 일부 유료콘텐츠에 대하여는 관련 법령에 따라 청약철회(구매취소)가 제한될 수 있습니다. ● 청약 철회에 따른 효과 - 회사는 이용자로부터 재화 등을 반환 받은 경우 3영업일 이내에 대금을 환급합니다 단, 수납확인이 필요한 결제수단의 경우에는 수납확인일로부터 3영업일 이내에 이를 환급하도록 합니다. 이 경우 회사가 환급을 지연한 때에는 그 지연기간에 대하여 관련 법령에서 정한 이율을 곱하여 산정한 지연이자를 지급합니다. ● 미성년자 결제에 대한 조항 - 애플리케이션에서 판매되는 유료콘텐츠를 미성년자가 법정대리인의 동의 없이 결제한 경우, 미성년자 또는 법정대리인은 결제를 취소할 수 있습니다. 단, 미성년자의 유료콘텐츠 결제가 법정대리인으로부터 처분을 허락 받은 재산의 범위 내인 경우 또는 미성년자가 사술 등을 사용하여 성년자로 믿게 한 때에는 취소가 제한됩니다. 유료콘텐츠 구매자가 미성년자인지 여부는 결제가 진행된 단말기 또는 신용카드 등 결제수단의 명의자를 기준으로 판단됩니다. 미성년자 결제취소를 요청하시는 경우 회사의 필요에 따라 미성년자 및 법정대리인을 증명할 수 있는 서류를 제출하여야 합니다. description: ** Voted Top Health App of 2014 by leading doctors ** ** Voted Top Yoga App of 2014 by leading doctors ** “Yoga for Weight Loss” is part of Saagara’s new series of apps for various ailments. Combining the simplicity of “Core Yoga” with traditionally therapeutic yoga poses, we’ve constructed an app aimed solely at helping users manage their weight. While dieting has been shown to reduce visceral fat, exercise is essential for burning subcutaneous fat stores (those that cause belly and thigh fat). This app is designed to help you tone your abs, get in shape, and improve your overall health. According to the yogic texts, excess fat must be converted to strength and energy for effective weight loss. “Yoga for Weight Loss” has incorporated specific exercises which mobilize the body’s fat reserves and turn them into usable energy. Regular practice of these exercises makes the body lean and healthy. “Yoga for Weight Loss” draws upon traditional hatha yoga and was formulated by an expert in ancient yogic methods. The program guides you through several yoga poses while emphasizing correct breathing methods. As you become accustomed to the exercises, you can change the settings from beginner to intermediate to advanced, for a longer more effective session. Yoga asanas and techniques included: -Suryanamaskara A (Sun Salutation A) -Suryanamaskara B (Salutation B) – advanced -Trikonasana (Triangle Pose) -Veerabhadrasana (Warrior Pose) -Utkatasana (Chair Pose) – advanced -Purvantanasana (Upward Plan Pose) -Bhujangasana (Snake Pose) – intermediate -Shalabhasana (Locust Pose) – intermediate -Dhanurasana (Bow Pose) – intermediate -Sarvangasana (Shoulder Stand) -Ujjayee Panayama (Victorious Pranayama) This app has HD graphics and is compatible with high-resolution tablets. Users may want to first try our app "Core Yoga" which is better suited for beginners. After practicing "Core Yoga" for a few weeks, you should be able to comfortably practice "Yoga for Weight Loss”. Recommended by Leading Doctors https://www.healthtap.com/apps/7401 **This App is available for the PC and Mac as well**

국민 TV에 어떤 프로그램이 있는지 모르셨다구요? 이제 더이상 찾아 해매지 마세요~!!! 국민TV에서 진행 하는 모든 팟캐스트와 유튜브 영상 한곳에 모아 두었습니다. 팟캐스트 구독하기를 설정 하면 My메뉴에서 업데이트 되는 내역을 확인 하실수 있습니다. 메뉴에서 모바일 뉴스를 바로 확인 할수 있게 링크 되어 있습니다. - iTunes podcast 정보를 사용합니다. - iTunes 리뷰를 확인 하실수 있습니다. - 구독하기를 통해 업데이트된 팟케스트를 확인 할수 있습니다. - 청쥐중이던 팟케스트 방송 이어듣기 기능 제공 - 다운로드받은 파일이 있으면 다운 로드 된 파일로 재생 됩니다. - 안드로이드 시스템의 다운로더를 사용하여 안정적인 다운로드가 가능합니다.(와이파이 연결시에만 다운로드 설정시 와이파이 연결시 다운로드 진행 됩니다.) - 블루투스 혹은 이어폰에 리모컨 버튼의 동작을 지원합니다. - 다운로드 파일을 삭제 할수 있습니다. - 다운 받는 파일에 커버이미지와 프로그램 정보가 자동 입력 됩니다. - 다운로드 받은 파일은 어떤 플레이어에서든지 바로 청취 가능 합니다. - 안드로이드 시스템의 다운로더를 사용하여 안정적인 다운로드가 가능합니다.(와이파이 연결시에만 다운로드 설정시 와이파이 연결시 다운로드 진행 됩니다.) - 다운로드한 후 데이터 걱정 없이 편하게 감상하세요. 주요 팟캐스트 뉴스K 김용민의 조간브리핑 return! 나는 꼽사리다 서영석-김용민의 정치토크 민동기-김용민의 미디어 토크 서영석의 라디오 비평 조상운의 뉴스바 이작가-김용민의 변두리 인물현대사 김종대 정욱식의 진짜 안보 나비효과 - 막장드라마1 차승은의 뉴스잉글리시 김광수의 경제 소프트 이작가 문희정의 라이벌 라디오뉴스K 초대석 서화숙의 3분칼럼 노무현은 안죽었다 - 막장드라마2 임승수의 좌변기 밀실에서 광장으로 - 김용민 인문학으로 여는 오늘 전영관의 30분 책 읽기 이용마의 한국정치 손병휘의 나란히 가지 않아도 이슈탐험 황준호의 월드리뷰 '을(乙)트라맨이야' - 막장드라마3 물뚝심송의 나의 독재유산답사기 박한용의 라디오 백년전쟁 이런 변이 있나 김선&김남훈의 대국민 상담소 고상만의 수사반장 한쌤 문아나의 맘병통치약 뉴스의 재구성 '신바람 리박사' -라디오 드라마4 선대인의 대인경제 최동석-유정식-문희정의 경영토크 뉴스피드 '밤의 대통령' -라디오 드라마7 이강윤의 오늘 '귀태부녀' -라디오 드라마5 '은희와 하영이' -라디오 드라마6 김남훈의 인파이팅 대하드라마 김대중 - 라디오 드라마10 브로콜리 너마저 덕원의 보편적인 노래 김선의 시사 돌직구 이채훈의 킬링클래식 세계사 클래식 하종강의 노동학개론 이윤호의 고전으로 본 오늘 맹경순의 아름다운 세상 정운현-혜문스님의 문화유산 토크 어나더 타임 민영화의 민낯 국민라디오 스페셜 '빅데이터' -라디오 드라마8 K팟스타 최규성의 대중가요 LP가이드 조감 세상 발끈해의 해적 - 라디오 드라마9 김영경의 아프리카 청춘이다 문희정의 낭만음악실 채제민 김민기의 디디쇼 노정렬의 노발대발 꿈꾸는 협동조합 최광희의 영화 쉐이킷 오늘을 생각하며 별별특강 정승조가 모십니다 일어나! 최동호의 스포츠당 문희정의 끌림 특종의 진수 변정주의 조약돌 안진걸의 을(乙)아차차 마포 스퀘어 시사 애너그램 '공갈' 여기는 합정동 국민카페 똑똑한 12시 전영관의 롱테이크 정치 내비게이션 노동과 세계 뉴스혹 김응교의 일시적 순간 If people do not know what programs are on TV Gone?
