Os Detetives do Prédio Azul invadiram o mundo dos aplicativos para desvendar mais mistérios. Na primeira aventura fora do prédio Azul, os Detetives precisam encontrar Dona Leocádia. Escoteiros do Prédio Azul é a quarta da série de 5 histórias interativas de D.P.A. O que você vai encontrar: - Histórias exclusivas e interativas - O novo mascote dos Detetives - Jogos muito divertidos - A música dos Detetives para ouvir quando quiser... E muita aventura para você levar pra qualquer lugar! Detectives from the Blue Building invaded the world of apps to unravel more mysteries. In the first adventure outside the building Blue, the detectives must find Dona Leocadia. Scouts Building Blue is the fourth in the series of 5 interactive stories DPA   What you'll find: - Stories exclusive and interactive - The new mascot of the Detectives - Very fun games - The music of Detectives want to hear when ...   And plenty of adventure for you to take you anywhere!

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Santa is waiting for you in the new game Santa. Christmas sunrise (beta)! Help Santa Claus hand out presents at Christmas. In the game, you will manage a sleigh of Santa Claus and hand out gifts in all the houses in the level. Achieve the best results, and will not allow shot down Santa and left Christmas without the gifts. To do this, use your driving skills on sled and overcome encountered obstacles. This fun game is suitable for both phone and tablet. In the beta version at the moment there is 2 levels, but do not worry, because developers are constantly working on new exciting levels. You can help them by leaving your comments and suggestions. Embark on an exciting journey together with Santa! Features: - Easy and effective controls - Funny music - Beautiful HD graphics - Suitable for children

This is your "offline" Karaoke with hundreds of songs including Let It Go. Once installed, no additional download is required. No streaming or buffering needed. The recording capability is now added. Note when recording: all audio input comes from your Android device's microphone. So, avoid using headphones when recording. :)

description: Getting start here : http://goo.gl/6KQ2Yj ** NOTE : This app does NOT encrypt data. Store sensitive data in clipboards is NOT recommended. This App can help you quick copy some text from list ( I call it "Clip" in this App ) that you've pre-created. Just copy and paste anywhere you need. And more five helpful feature : 1. Floating Window - Floating window on the top. 2. Minimize automatically - Minimize automatically after copying text. 3. Quick input - Type words on floating window. Convenient when using full screen App. 4. Share Text -Quick store text from other App via "Share text" 5. History- Record all text you've copied. ( Android 3.0+ ) Android 2.2+ required. Hint : With "Notification Toggle"(by j4velin) App , you can add shortcut and launch Floating Clipboard in Notification bar. It's convenient for you to quick launch Floating Clipboard. Hint : Xperia Users can launch Floating Clipboard from SmallApp Dock. com.sony.smallapp,SmallApp,Clipboard,darkk6,Xperia,floating,float,sony Small apps extension for Sony products
release_text: v 1.2.9 - Add : Setting shortcut in App drawer - Fix : Some device cannot restore Floating window *1 - Add : Provide Iconify restore adjust seek bar. *1 *1 : Some device will not restore Floating Clipboard when clicking small/iconify "floating block". If your device has this problem, go to floating clipboard setting and increase " Iconify restore adjust" value then try again. Find the best value for your devices.

description: You are captain of a submarine on a secret mission behind enemy lines. Your mission is to: - Sink all battleships - Don't sink friendly ships - Avoid enemy torpedoes Features: - 5 types of weapons: - Torpedo - Auto guiding torpedo - Auto guiding rocket - Electro-magnetic impulse - Nuclear rocket - 3 types of enemy boats and additional friendly boat - 3 different time settings: Night, Dawn, Day - Upgrade armor shield of your submarine and upgrade speed of your torpedoes Defeat your enemies and win the war!
release_text: - Tap to fire ( configurable in options menu ) - Ability to play for 3 different countries : USA, Russia and China - 5 types of weapons: - Torpedo - Auto guiding torpedo - Auto guiding rocket - Electro-magnetic impulse - Nuclear rocket - 3 different time settings: Night, Dawn, Day - Upgrade armor shield of your submarine and upgrade speed of your torpedoes

description: The Black Vault Companion App offers users a long list of features and EXCLUSIVE content not available on TheBlackVault.com - one of the internet's largest destinations for all things government secrets, cover-ups, and the unknown! This app features: - DAILY news on UFOs, Paranormal, Government Conspiracies and cover-ups. - DAILY updates to a massive research archive of declassified government documents, already more than 1,000,000 pages in size. - DAILY updates of recent and past case files like UFO sightings, alien abductions, chem trail reports, ghost reports, cryptozoology and much more. - DAILY uploads of videos and streaming media on all sorts of topics - REAL-TIME updates on a popular Message Forum at TheBlackVault.com ABOUT THE BLACK VAULT: The Black Vault is a massive research center archiving what the U.S. government is trying to hide... from YOU. One of the biggest sections on The Black Vault is the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) Government Document archive, spanning more than ONE MILLION pages of material. You will also find a popular message forum, a case file database to submit your own cases along with viewing others (like UFOs, Paranormal and Military Activity etc.), a chat room, a radio network, and much more!
release_text: - Updated news feed to ensure faster news delivery, format, update frequency and ease of use.

description: Open World Traffic Racer is a free roam traffic racing game. You can drive with your sport car around the city and jump over houses and traffic cars. Try to reach each checkpoint in time but be cautious. Serious car damage may occur, especially when you crash with other cars. You can turn off ABS (Anti-Lock Braking System), TC (Traction Control) and ESP (Electronic Stability Program). Features: - Endless traffic city - Real damage - Steering: steering wheel, touch control or tilt - Realistic driving experience - View from cockpit of the car - Realistic sound environment - Beautiful high quality FULL HD graphics Please give us some support by following us on: Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/onotion Youtube - http://goo.gl/QHYxgz

Cacas palavras Brasil! Caça Palavras Fãs ! Temos notícia incrível para você! Depois do nosso primeiro jogo Word Pesquisa que foi instalado mais de 2 milhão no Brasil e Português, Caça Palavras II está agora no Google Play Store. Se você gostou do nosso primeiro jogo Caça Palavras , você provavelmente fantasia este! Alcançar a maior pontuação e competir com seus amigos e também outros fãs Cacá Palavras graças ao placar on-line no Google+! Há 12 palavras escondidas em um quebra-cabeça 5X5 . Seu objetivo é encontrar essas palavras o mais rápido possível . As palavras podem ser exploradas através da ligação das letras vizinhas em todas as direções possíveis . Pontuação é calculada com base no comprimento das palavras encontradas e o tempo decorrido . Quando você encontrar todas as palavras do quebra-cabeça , a pontuação é enviado para o placar online no Google+. Você pode ver os melhores jogadores diariamente, semanalmente ou para todos os momentos. Se você não prefere entrar com Google+ , você ainda pode jogar o jogo no modo offline, mas sua pontuação não é submetido a placar on-line neste caso. Divirta-se todos! Cacas Brazil words! WordFind Fans! We have incredible news for you! After our first game Word Search that was installed more than 2 million in Brazil and Portuguese, Hunting Words II is now in the Google Play Store. If you liked our first game hunting words, you probably fancy this! Achieve the highest score and compete with your friends and also other words Cacá fans thanks to the online scoreboard on Google+! There are 12 hidden words in a puzzle 5X5. Your goal is to find these words as quickly as possible. Words can be exploited by connecting the neighboring letters in every possible direction. Score is calculated based on the length of words found and the time elapsed. When you find all the words of the puzzle, the scores are sent to the online scoreboard on Google+. You can see the best players daily, weekly or for all times. If you do not prefer to use Google+, you can still play the game in offline mode, but your score is not subjected to online score this case. Have fun everyone!

Do you have 10-15 minutes to kill? Alpha Wave was made for just such an occasion! A well polished, high-speed, intense arcade space shooter with it's roots firmly planted in the old-school arcade classics such as AstroSmash, Galaga and Asteroids. Plenty of non-stop, progressive, survival action with over 65 waves spread across 3 levels featuring a huge variety of different enemies each with their own unique behaviors along with final bosses to bring it all to an explosive finish. Coupled with amazing special effects, leader boards, 24 achievements to unlock and an amazing musical score, Alpha Wave delivers solid quality for far less than the price of a cup of glorified, high society coffee! Alpha Wave is fully Android controller ready and compatible with a wide array of HID ready controllers such as nVidia Shield, Xperia Play, Moga Pro, Wikipad, Mad Catz Mojo, Six-Axis and many more! Also featured in Tegra Zone. Play it on the nVidia Shield or Shield Tablet for an absolutely epic experience! PLEASE READ: If something isn't working, CONTACT US! We will sort you out quickly and have you playing in no time! The few complaints we've had, have all been quickly sorted and resolved with very satisfied customers. Read the reviews and see for yourself! We are gamers too and expect quality in our game as well. :)
release_text: * Android TV tweaks for UI and TV over scan. * Fixed minor achievement bug.

description: 'Shape down’ is a game that requires both nimble fingers and fast reactions. See if you can make the shapes disappear before they fall down by pressing buttons corresponding to the on-coming ‘shape’. The more ‘shapes’ you eliminate, the higher your multiplier will go. If you get tired mid-game, you can always pause it by touching the centre of the screen. Once you master the NORMAL mode, you can always spice things up with the HARDCORE mode, with fewer lives and less time to act and - WHAT’S MORE - with buttons switching places after every single touch! Don’t forget to type in your name and post your score, once you are finished, so that everyone can see who’s the boss. Also, don’t forget to check out the alternative theme in the Options menu. Try it out NOW for FREE! And don’t forget to rate the game and recommend it to your friends! Any feedback would also be appreciated! Enjoy!
release_text: - New game mode - Fixed the issue where the score would not upload - Added achievements - Game will now show your position in the leaderboards (applies to scores posted after update)

description: Following the Combat In The Fortress success we decided to release a new one Special features: - Team Match game mode - Timed match - Great learning field where you learn to fight against several soldiers computer-controlled - Double control Joystick or Tilt rotation - Radar system Starting with one Map "Barracks" others coming soon Combat In The Fortress is about shooting console quality game. Combat In The Fortress is about loving and upgrading your gun. Combat In The Fortress is about shedding the blood of your enemies and not having yours spilled. You will need quick reflexes and superior aiming skills to shoot your way out of this one. *** MULTIPLAYER ***Find yourself a worthy opponent and compete head-on with other players (3G and Wi-Fi). Become the best and boast your position in the top ranks! GO CROSS-PLATFORM: Have others platform players for breakfast! Take part in the fight and represent your platform! The Novice Tier offers battles featuring slower-paced enemies who take fewer shots before dying. *** GREAT SINGLE PLAYER FPS ***No on-line players? then shoot at computer-controlled soldiers 9 WEAPONS- BallisticKnife- Handgun- Grenade- Grenade Launcher- M87T- MP5KA4- RPG- SniperRifle- STW-25OTHER FEATURES• lots of blood, explosions • awesome graphics• realistic sound effects Note: Not recommended low resolutions less than 800x480
release_text: Ver. 5.1 - Fix leading indication on Dead-Match - Now In Team Dead-Match, "Radar" show different colour based on Team - Minor fixing Ver. 5.0 Added Play Games service - Leader-board - Achievements Skill level Bug Fixing

description: Are you ready for the special summer desserts? OH YES you can now learn how to make yummy and delicious ice cream shakes in this chef maker fun. Shakes are the healthy and sweet icy desserts, loved by kids, boys and girls. Summer are hot so you need to chill with the best maker to make, decorate and virtually drink ice cream shakes. Let make the best cold dessert, the ice cream shakes and to make it even more tempting you can decorate it with various toppings, icings, syrups and much more. Boys and girls is party time! A yummy ice cream shake at lunch time makes you feel awesome. No more wait before you get your hands on the ice chilled shakes made with milk, fruits and ice cream. Who loves ice creams and other ice desserts? YES we all do. Let’s learn how to make ice creams in this maker game for kids. Have a wonderful experience of making ice cream shakes on special occasions like a Birthday party, New Year, Wedding and other special moments. >>> ATTRACTIONS <<< • Perfect Game for kids to enjoy creating their own Ice Cream Shake • Amazing background themes and colorful toppings • Real kitchen chef cooking experience & creativity skills • Dozens of items including dress up items like creams, icing, syrups • Free recipe to make homemade ice cream shake • Share your Ice Cream Shake with friends on Facebook Open your own ice cream shake salon and make ice dessert with all the ingredients. Dress up and décor you ice cream shakes and have a delight. Fulfill your chef dreams now and enjoy with friends and family. >>> JOIN OUR FACEBOOK PAGE <<< Join us on Facebook to share your experiences and stay updated with Boo Boo Games. Play and have fun with our doctor and maker games. We have much more lined up for our fans so stay tuned. https://www.facebook.com/funbooboogames >>> MESSAGE <<< Your suggestions & Feedback are valuable to help us keep working on apps for kids. >>> DISCLAIMER <<< This app is ad supported and may contain ads.

description: Wallet by truemoney is the premier personal financial service, available to all operators: TrueMove H, AIS, DTAC. Whether will it be online shopping with WeCard, paying your bills with Scan & Pay, top-up prepaid phone, or money transfer, Wallet can serve your financial needs anytime anywhere. 1. WeCard: Prepaid Mastercard that enables you to shop online or purchase games/apps on Google Play. Open and activates right within the app. 2. Bill payment with Scan & Pay: True bills, utilities, credit cards, insurance, etc. all for free! Just scan the barcode* with your phone. Save bills to Favorite menu for online inquiry and payment. 3. Mobile Top-up: Top-up TrueMove H prepaid phone 4. Buy Truemoney Cashcard: Delivered instantly. Also, you can buy LINE stickers/items with Cash Card. 5. Money transfer: Transferring to other Wallet accounts for free, or to any bank account for only 10 Baht. Meeting Minutes Sync is an add-on app to enable the sync of data between multiple devices. Meeting Minutes Sync can also be used to backup your data on the cloud that can be retrieved at any time from any device. To use sync, you should have Meeting Minutes (Pro) and Meeting Minutes Sync installed on each of your device. Meeting Minutes Sync comes with a free 3 day trial after which you will be requested to purchase a licence to continue using it. In this current version, the sync happens at the full database (and settings file) level. In future, we plan to optimize this by performing sync at the data element level to improve efficiency. Your data is absolutely SAFE. Please read our privacy policy for more information.

Players, Parents, and Coaches can use this APP as a powerful, comprehensive and easy-to-use tracking tool for Amateur level hockey (includes no advertising). - Create one or more Leagues. A league can optionally be divided into groups and subgroups. Each League is maintained independently. - Specify points awarded for Wins, Overtime Wins, Losses, Overtime Losses, and Draws - Add Teams - Add Scheduled Games between Teams - Update Game results simply by recording Goals directly, or indirectly by creating a detailed Game Log of Events. - Maintain a running Game Log of events to record Skater Goals, Assists, Shots on Goal, and Penalties by period and time and also Goalie Goals-Against, Saves, Wins, Losses, Overtime Losses, and Shutouts by period and time. The running Game Log updates Game Score and Team Standings. - Add Players as Skaters or Goalies. - Organize Players into “Lines” and view corresponding “Depth Chart” - Create a Player Game Log (Player statistics for a single Game) and view cumulative Player Statistics - Track different statistics for Skaters and Goalies - Optionally export data files to your device for analysis - Email screenshots - Select colors to customize display The App: - Customizes Portrait and Landscape version of Lists, i.e., shows core columns in Portrait view and adds additional columns in Landscape view. - Separates Team and Player Statistics for Pre-Season, Regular Season and Post-Season for each League. - Updates Team Standings as Game Scores are updated. - Updates cumulative Player Statistics based on updates to the Player’s Game Log - Tracks different statistics for Skaters and Goalies - Tracks separate Post-Season Playoff Rounds (Qualification Playoffs, Quarterfinals, Semi-finals, Finals, and Consolation Final by Wins - Offers alternative ways to update cumulative Team and Player standings via entry of minimal score details to entry of comprehensive and detailed events by period. - Creates CSV files for analysis - Includes List screens with rich filtering and sorting capabilities, and an easy to use interface for updating statistics with “+” and “-” buttons Privacy: - Includes no advertising - No user data is captured or tracked - The App requests permission to save Screen-prints and export files to your device storage. These are files are created at your discretion for your own email and analysis keywords: hockey, sports, scores, scorekeeper, teams, players, games, standings, statistics, depth chart, coaches you tube : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jYbhDdoh3xc

description: Mobile Aircraft Encyclopedia allows users to view technical data of aicrafts as described in ICAO (International Civil Aviation Organization) Doc8643. This is an educational and reference tool and is NOT intended for flight planning. MAE uses the following aircraft sources: 1 - ICAO Doc8643 (Edition 40) Desktop version: http://www.doc8643.com Permissions explained: (for the paranoic in you :-)) ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - Allows this application to view the state of all networks. Used to determine if there's a network connection. WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Allows this application to write to USB storage. Used to store aircraft data on local device. INTERNET - Allows this application to create network sockets. Used to get files from remote servers.

description: Ice Cream Sandwich CM7 Theme THIS IS FOR HDPI DEVICES ONLY. IGNORE THE MISSING ASSETS NOTIFICATION WHEN APPLYING THE THEME. PLEASE READ THE INSTRUCTIONS. This is a theme application for the new T-Mobile Theme Engine included in the CyanogenMod7 ROM and some other ROMs. This theme is inspired by Android 4.0: Ice Cream Sandwich. The lock screen and some system dialogs cannot be themed in the T-Mobile Theme Engine, therefore they will remain unchanged. Get the matching LauncherPro Theme here: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.sonny.lp.ics You can post comments/suggestions and get Docks, Icons, Wallpapers, Morphs and MODs here: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=18573172# INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS: Download the theme, go to the theme chooser app. Select the Theme & apply. You may get an error: 'Sorry, this theme is missing assets for your device's screen size'. Ignore that and apply it anyway and REBOOT. Disable the USB debugging notification as it cannot be themed and will look out of place. Be sure to check out my other themes!
release_text: Redrew the LauncherPro preferences menu icon Added ICS blue back to the market as the default color Fixed call log titlebar Added a new icon for ADW settings Added the dock timepicker images to all variations of ADW to match the rest of the theme Changed the text selection color for default orange to ICS blue Fixed the GPS statusbar notification discrepancy Removed the grey dividers as they only go well with the ICS background, go to my xda thread of you want that mod

☺Rage Comics Photo Editor☺ is the perfect app for messing with your friends and having the best time while doing it! Everyone finds putting funny stickers on photos hilarious, but this photo editing app takes it to the whole new level! Rage comics, funny faces and all other sorts of meme faces are pretty much the funniest pics you have ever seen! With this superb application you will get around 300 faces which you can stick to your photos and do whatever your imagination allows you do to with each particular face. Promise, you'll laugh so hard that you might tear a bit! Download ☺Rage Comics Photo Editor☺entirely free of charge and enjoy trolling your friends' faces! ☺☺☺ Playing with pictures, that is photo editing, is particularly fun if you are doing it with a friend's face, creating a trollface. Upload a picture from your phone gallery or take a new picture right before you start messing with it and go wild! Choose a face in the crowd, think about what kind of “funny face” you want to stick over it, open the comic face gallery, where you can find 299 rage faces and make the switch. If the picture, you have chosen to decorate, is clear enough and has a resolution high enough, the face recognition option in the application is activated. This means that the app will automatically choose a funny face from the gallery and stick it over all the faces it has managed to recognize. Otherwise you will have to do it manually, by yourself, since the face recognition feature in the app won't work. The meme faces that the application picks are chosen randomly. If you don't like how the app has distributed “rage comics” on your photo, you can always replace them with a different comic face. Just tap on the sticker you want to move and you can: change the position of the sticker scale it, zoom in, zoom out erase the sticker - just tap on it and then on the trash can and it's done choose the mirror effect bring a particular sticker in front of all others If stickers are not enough for you, play with text – you can write anything that comes to mind! Make a funny slogan to put on your photo, make additional fun out of your already messed up friends on the photo. Make it look hilarious! Move it around, scale it, zoom in, zoom out, choose whether you want it to be black or white. Put your imagination to the test, roll up your sleeves and be creative! You'll have crazy fun! Rage stickers come in various shapes. Share your photo with the rest of the world. There is an option in the application for sharing pictures on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram. If you choose so, you can share your pictures on all three of them. This free app is particularly great for birthday parties! Stick the funniest angry face to the birthday boy or girl and they'll laugh as hard as they can. Your friends will be thrilled with your new app. Guaranteed, it will become the new favorite toy of your group! This can also be a social application. You can decorate pictures together with your friends, your boyfriend or girlfriend. What ever way you choose to do it, you will definitely have unimaginable fun! Pictures in your gallery will gain a new and refreshing look with this amazingly fun app.☺Rage Comics Photo Editor☺is the app you will love, and the best thing is, it's totally free! What are you waiting for? Download it now and start the fun!

Fruit Drops 2 - Match three puzzle begins as a simple match three board game and gradually increases difficulties as obstacles are added and level objectives becomes more challenging. Introducing a new Objective/Obstacle - Netted Fruit. • Fruit Drops 2 introduces the netted fruit • Addictive match three puzzle game. • Multiple objectives,challenges and obstacles • 15 Fruity power up combinations! • Each level presents you with unique Objectives and Challenges. • Obstacles mixed with unique level board shapes will keep you swapping and swiping fruits for more! • Make delicious cascades. Chained power-up madness to level up! • Three different difficulty levels. -------------------------------------------------------- There are four possible objectives on each level. 1. Score quota 2. Removing dark pulps 3. Bringing down popsicles. 4. Free all the fruit from the net. There are two possible challenges on each level. 1. Complete the objective before time runs out. 2. Complete the objective before you run out of swaps. -------------------------------------------------------- Obstacles. 1. Fruit crate / Fruit Pie: A Fruit crate can not be moved, can only be cleared if an adjacent fruit is cleared or if a fruit jar or a double fruit power up is triggered. Clearing a Fruit crate leaves a level 3 dark pulp. 2. Netted Fruit: A fruit behind a net can not be moved or swapped. Can only be removed by matching the fruit behind the net with two other fruits of the same kind, or if it's in the path of a triggered power up chain. -------------------------------------------------------- Objectives. 1. Score quota - You need to reach a certain score in order to level up. 2. Remove dark pulps. dark pulps are removed by clearing the fruit ontop of the dark pulp. There are 3 levels of dark pulps. The darkest pulp needs to be removed 3 times, which means you need clear 3 fruits ontop of that dark pulp. Fruit crates also creates a level 3 dark pulp and needs to be cleared. 3. Bring down the popsicle. Bring down the popsicle to the bottom of the gameboard. 4. Free the netted fruit. Free all the fruit from net. -------------------------------------------------------- Challenges. 1. Time challenged. Complete the objective(s) before time runs out. 2. Swap limit. Complete the objective(s) before you run out of swaps. Matching 4 or more fruits rewards the player with a power up fruit There are 3 power ups. 1. Fruit jar (horizontal and vertical orientation). 2. Double fruit. 3. Sunflower.
